The detection speed and accuracy of the detection system have been improved greatly by adopting digital signal processing technology. The human-machine interaction of the detection system has also been made friendLier by adopting ARM embedded technology. In actual appLication, the new detection system based on wireless, DSP and ARM technologies compared with the traditional detection system based on MCU has the advantages of high performance, easy wiring and extension, remote monitoring, etc.

keywords.kw: Liquid flow, wireless Sensor Network, DSP, ARM

article_rec.title: Load Experiment of Prestressed Hollow Concrete Plank Using in Bridge

abstract.par: The static finite analysis and load experiment of a prestressed hollow concrete plank using in bridge were carried out in this text. And the result proves that the plank has a high safety abundance in the designed load. At the same time the plank meets the Code for Design of Highway Reinforced Concrete and Pretressed Concrete Bridges and Culverts JTG D62-2004 and The Method of Measuring and Evaluating of the Loading Capacity on the Highway Old Bridge (try a Line)1988, so it can be used in building or maintenance of the given bridge. The method of load experiment in the text is simple and easy in using. And it can be used for reference to expert in the similar experiment.

keywords.kw: prestressed hollow concrete plank, load experiment, intension, round

article_rec.title: Logic Constitution of Mechatronic System

abstract.par: A new mechatronic system with complex functions is created via coupLing and integration of "mechatronic elements". Mechatronic systems are divided into two groups of element level and systematical level and their corresponding logic constitutions are given and analyzed. The integrated design method for mechatronic systems are proposed and the emergence of the components in the logic constitution of the mechatronic systems during the conceptual design are analyzed.

keywords.kw: Conceptual design, logic constitution, mechatronic element, unitization design

article_rec.title: Long-term Capacity Planning with Multi-process Routing for Mould Enterprise

abstract.par: Long-term capacity planning is a strategically important macroeconomic poLicy-making for mould enterprise, having a large influence on the investment cost and profit. This paper develops an integer programming method of long-term capacity planning considering the multi-process routings of mould parts. Firstly, a multi-process routing model of the mould parts is proposed based on the net flow theory. With the constraints of the flow balance of the net nodes and the capacity Limit of the faciLities, the integer programming mathematical formulation is then developed. Finally, a typical case of a real-Life mould industry is studied and solved using a commercial package called LiNGO. The results show the vaLidity and practicabiLity of this method.

keywords.kw: long-term capacity planning, multi-process routing, net flow, mould enterprise

article_rec.title: Machining and Installing the Four over Dowel Holes with Variables Before and After Installation Based on Parameter Programming

abstract.par: The thesis elaborates the solution with parameter programming that base on the SINUMERIK 802D system' N/C center, The machined big locating hole and the raw 3-625H7 cyLindriform dowel hole's distribution circle get deformed after the four over dowel holes on a kind of annular gear having been machined and given heat treatment. During the instalLing, the components unfurl them to retrieve circularity. It shows a parameter programming method with high accuracy when we have process analyses on condition that they have not retrieved circularity. It suppLies ood example on how to deal with elongation compensated by programming. The method will be suitable to apply to other N/C systems.

keywords.kw: parameter programming, over locate, deformcompensate

article_rec.title: Mathematical Model and Simulation for Testing Aspheric Surface Using the Digital Moire Patterns by Sub-region Stitching Method

abstract.par: sub-region stitching measurement of a sphere by using the combination of digital moire patterns witHout compensator, auxiLiary mirror, hologram and other assistant modules. This paper illustrated the basic theory. And use of digital filtering, phase shifting, the least square method and Zernike polynomial fitting to estabLish the reasonable mathematical model. Meanwhile the computer simulation experiment was carried on. the PV and RMS of the full aperture phase distribution residual error are 0.072λand 0.0092#x03BB; After this method processing. The results show that the spLicing model and the moire patterns processing algorithm is accurate and feasible, Thus proposed another kind to be able the quota examination aspheric surface method.

keywords.kw: digital moiré patterns, sub_region stitching, least squares fitting, Zernike polynomial fitting

article_rec.title: Measurement and Analysis on Emissions from an EFI Gasoline Engine under Transient Conditions

abstract.par: The volumetric percents of CO, HC, NOX, CO2 and O2 from the exhaust of an EFI gasoLine engine were measured and analyzed under the working conditions of its cold-start, cold-acceleration-deceleration, warm-deceleration and warm-acceleration. The results show that: A large amount of HC and CO is emitted from the engine under cold-start condition. During this period, the catalytic converter doesn't yet begin to work. So the control of exhaust depends mainly on the preparation of mixture and the optimization of the combustion process. During cold-acceleration-deceleration, there are peak values in the curves of CO, HC and NOX emissions, showing that it is necessary to avoid these operations as much as possible in the actual running. Under warm-deceleration, there is a large peak value in the curve of HC emissions, showing that it is necessary to research the strategy of cutting off fuel further. And the emphasis of exhaust control is NOX under warm-acceleration condition.

keywords.kw: EFI gasoLine engine, emission, measurement, analysis, transient conditions

article_rec.title: Mechanism Principle and Dynamics Simulation on Variable Diameter Walking Wheel

abstract.par: Starting from the principle and strategy of changing the diameter of walking wheel, applying ANSYS "C FEMBS "C SIMPACK to construct model of flexible connectors with geometric stiffness. Based on the theory of continuous colLision, we introduce mobile marker to define the nonLinear contact between the wheel's caster and ground. The rigid-flexible simulation analysis was carried out to wheel body system which consisting of six flexible spring connectors, to get the dynamic response in the mode of changing the diameter in situ and to get the minimum size of torque needing for changing diameter. The simulation's results provides theoretical basis for subsequent prototype development, and can be used as the references for further experiment's studying.

keywords.kw: Variable Diameter Walking Wheel, Flexible Spring Connectors, Strategy of Diameter Changing, Rigid-flexible CoupLing, Dynamics Simulation

article_rec.title: Model Based Comprehensive Functional Verification of RF SoC

abstract.par: Functional verification of RF SoC is a daunting task which results from its complexity in terms modes of operation, extensive digital caLibration, and architectural algorithms. As what happened in digital cirCuit design, analog and RF (A/RF) verification has been becoming a separate and critical task from the recent on. In this paper, base-band modeLing and event-driven simulation technology are adopted to perform the functional verification of a RF SoC system which contains RF front-ends, mixer, IF filters, ADC/DAC, and the following digital data processing center unit. Mixed level co-simulation results of cadence AMS designer demonstrate the rationaLity of the proposed methodology.

keywords.kw: RF SoC, functional verification, base-band modeLing, event-driven simulation, Mixed level co-simulation

article_rec.title: Modeling and Simulation Analysis of NC Camshaft Grinding System

abstract.par: Based on NC system of Siemens 840D, and taking Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor(PMSM) as control object, each sector of rotational axis(Axis C) and wheel feed shaft (Axis X) which affect the camshaft grinding accuracy, is thoroughly analyzed in this paper by mechanism analysis. In accordance to the method of Three Loop Control (Current Loop-Speed Loop-Position Loop) which deduces transfer function gradually inside and out, the mathematical models of entire camshaft grinding servo system are estabLished. On that basis, these models are emulated by SIMULiNK in order to carry on the further study of high precision grinding.

keywords.kw: cam grinding, profile error, Three Loop Control, mathematic modeLing, SIMULiNK emulation

article_rec.title: Modeling and Simulation of Dynamic Characteristics of a Bipropellant-Powered Hydraulic Free Piston Engine

abstract.par: Bipropellant-powered hydrauLic free piston engine (BHFPE) is a new type HFPE, which takes advantage of bipropellant in place of conventional fossil fuel, and employs catalytic ignition instead of spark or compression ignition. Under the alternative drive of the left and right combustion chamber, free piston assembly (FPA) within the BHFPE moves Linearly back and forth between left and right extremes and pumps hydrauLic fluid to drive load. Different from crankshaft engine, owing no crank-Link mechanism, the motion of FPA depends entirely on forces that acting on it. Based on introduction of the basic configuration of the BHFPE, the working process and features were described first, and then mathematical models are estabLished as well as simulation of dynamic characteristics are carried out.

keywords.kw: HydrauLic free piston engine, Bipropellant, Dynamic characteristics

article_rec.title: Modeling of Hydraulic Controlled and Regulated Direct Method in the Cutter System of Shield Tunneling Machine

abstract.par: This paper is mainly concerned with the technology about how to improve the response of the cutter system when the shield machine encounters sudden load changes. By analyzing the conventional control method of the displacement of the pump, a new control method named as hydrauLic controlled and regulated direct method is proposed. In order to make a comparison between the two control methods, the two simulation models are constructed in AMESim software. The simulation results show that the new control method has a shorter response time and better dynamic behavior, when the shield machine encounters sudden load changes and the system pressure jumps from 7 MPa to 25 MPa. The length of the pipe between the shuttle valve and the pump is taken into account in affecting the response of the system.

keywords.kw: cutter system, shield machine, simulation models, AMESim

article_rec.title: Modeling of Precision ReliabiLity for NC Machine Tool Based on Multi-body System Theory

abstract.par: ReLiabiLity is one of the most important performances of CNC machine tools. Precision exceeding tolerance is a special kind of faults different with general faults considered usually. This type of faults may cause large loss for users because of the loss of machining precision. To predict the precision and its reLiabiLity of machine tools in the design phase, the concept of precision reLiabiLity is introduced first in the paper. Second, the process of precision decLine in the operating conditions is analyzed and a precision reLiabiLity model is proposed. To evaluate the parameters of the precision reLiabiLity model, the spatial error model based on multi-body system theory and multi-body system dynamics simulation are adopted. Forecasting precision Life for a lathe has been done applying the model finally.

keywords.kw: CNC machine tools, precision reLiabiLity, multi-body system theory, virtual mockup

article_rec.title: Monitoring of Summer High Temperature Disaster of Rice by Using MODIS Data

abstract.par: High temperature plays a critical impact on rice yield during heading stage of rice in summer in south China and thermal remote sensing is capable of estimating air temperature under cloudless condition. This paper first introduces a newly statistical algorithm for daytime air temperature (Ta) retrievals over east China by using the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) data in 2006. Error analysis for Aqua MODIS Ta retrievals shows overall statistics of R = 0.94, RMSE = 3.52 OC, and Bias = -0.4 OC. Further monitoring of summer high temperature by using Aqua Ta in south China in 2007 reveals a serious high temperature disaster of rice, which is consistent with the field observation.

keywords.kw: MODIS, Air Temperature, High Temperature, Thermal Band

article_rec.title: Multi-Projection-Based Thousand-Arm Guanyin DOM

abstract.par: Digital Orthophoto Map (DOM) provides first-hand basic information for the status investigation of cultural reLics as an important approach to reserve and protect cultural reLics in their current status. This paper proposes a technology for producing multi-projection and HD-videoed-based THousand-Arm Guanyin DOM by HD videoing the same Bodhisattva hand from multiple projection planes and performing the texture mapping based on multiple projection datum planes to produce high-accuracy digital orthophoto map. This technology decreases distortion of image projection caused by single projection plane in conventional methods and increases DOM accuracy and fideLity. Finally, DOM using single projection plane is compared with DOM using multiple projection planes in terms of accuracy and fideLity.

keywords.kw: Projection datum plane, image correction, texture mapping, DOM

article_rec.title: Networked Technical Services Oriented Production Process

abstract.par: For many problems of traditional technical services, this paper presented the networked technical services oriented the production process in order to meet the needs of modern manufacturing model. This paper focused on analyzing the user needs of production process technical services, and studied the main problems existing in the traditional mode of technical services and the features of networked technical services. What is more, it structured the main function module of the system of the networked technical services oriented production process. Finally, it researChed the workflow of the networked technical services. This paper provided a reference for improving the quaLity and efficiency of technical services in the production process, as adopting advanced computer technology, networked technology and artificial intelLigence technology.

keywords.kw: Production process, Technical services, Function modules

article_rec.title: Neural Network Adaptive Control of Piezoelectric Actuator in Scanning Tunneling Microscope

abstract.par: Piezoelectric ceramics actuators have ultra high resolution, but the positioning precision is depressed by the inherent characteristic of hysteresis and nonLinearity. Accurate tracking is difficult to be achieved. An adaptive control sCheme combining neural network estimator with traditional PID controller is proposed to improve the performance of piezo-actuator in Scanning TunneLing Microscope. The mathematical model of the actuator is estabLished based on the analysis of displacement mechanism. A neural network estimator is used to predict the displacement in the next step, and parameters in the traditional PID controller are modified through adjusting the weight values in the neural network with the function of self-learning and adaptabiLity. A low frequency sine reference signal with the ampLitude of 30µm is appLied to the control system to vaLidate the effectiveness of the proposed method. The results show that the mean tracking errors are reduced from 0.45µm under traditional PID control to 0.22µm of neural network control. The project requirement is satisfied.

keywords.kw: Piezoelectric ceramics, Precision positioning, Neural Network, Adaptive control, PID

article_rec.title: New Micro-displacement Feeding Mechanism for Hone Stones

abstract.par: In view of traditional hydrauLic micro-displacement mechanisms in honing, complexity of structure, low control resolution and low efficiency have greatly Limited appLications and the popularization of honing. These micro-displacement feeding mechanisms are unfit to be appLied in multi-channel feeding for large diameter parts because of their low efficiency. So, in this paper, a new strategy for micro-displacement feeding was researChed, and its concrete structure was designed too. Based on simulation results, this new structure could totally replace hydrauLic system or screw rod type devices in honing. In addition, this strategy could also be used in other fields requiring micro-displacement feeding.

keywords.kw: honing, piezoelectric ceramics, micro-displacement ampLifier, flexure hinge

article_rec.title: Nonlinear Adaptive Control for Low Earth Orbit Formation Flying

abstract.par: This paper considers the tracking control problem of LEO formations subjected to unknown disturbances consisting of J2 and air drag. The full nonLinear relative dynamics of the follower with respect to the leader are used to develop an adaptive control law to account for unknown disturbances. The disturbance estimation is derived using a Lyapunov-based method. The combination of the disturbance estimation, the feedback Linearization and the LQR controller ensures the global asymptotic stabiLity of the closed-loop system. Simulation results are presented to illustrate the efficiency of the adaptive control law.

keywords.kw: Formatoin Flying, Adaptive Control, Disturbance Estimation, Feedback Linearization, Low Earth Orbit

article_rec.title: Novel Adaptive Filter Method and Application in Broken Rotor Bar Fault Diagnosis of Induction Motor

abstract.par: To improve the fault diagnosis accuracy of the broken rotor bar (BRB) of the squirrel-cage induction motor, a novel fault diagnosis method of the BRB based on the adaptive notch filter (ANF) and the Hilbert-Huang transform (HHT) was proposed. The stator current signal of the squirrel-cage induction motor was used to detect the feature of the BRB. The ANF was used to deal subsidence with the BRB signal. It can eLiminate the interference from the power frequency component to the frequency component of the BRB and achieve the precise identification to the frequency component of the BRB in the special marginal spectrum of the HHT. Experiments show that the combination of the ANF and the HHT can achieve the precise location to the frequency component of the BRB and also avoid the mode aLias phenomenon from the HHT.

keywords.kw: Fault Diagnosis, Broken Rotor Bar, Hilbert-Huang Transformation, Adaptive Notch Filter

article_rec.title: Novel Sustainable Metal Removal by Biologically Produced Ferric Sulphate

abstract.par: The present work was aimed at studying the effect of biologically produced ferric sulphate on metal removal. By using biologically produced ferric sulphate the amount of 1.40, 1.10, 0.44, 0.40, and 3.016 g/L mass was removed for copper (6 h), nickel (10 h), zinc (8 h), aluminium (36 h) and tin (72 h) respectively. These interesting results motivate further the use of biologically produced ferric sulphate for mobiLization of metals from electronic waste. A sustainable recycLing process can be estabLished for extraction of metals from electronic waste by using biologically produced ferric sulphate.

keywords.kw: Biomachining, Ferric sulphate, Metal removal, Sustainable recycLing process

article_rec.title: Numerical Simulation of a Leakage Magnetic Flux for Permanent Magnet DC Motors

abstract.par: On the basis of the analysis of the flux leakage mechanism of permanent magnet DC motors, boundary conditions for numerical simulation of a leakage magnetic flux are estabLished. By using the finite element analysis software Magnet, the motor leakage magnetic flux is simulated under different boundary conditions. The results of numerical simulation agree with the results of the test in the motor, which proves that theoretical calculation is right.

keywords.kw: leakage magnetic flux, permanent magnet motor, finite element, the software Magnet

article_rec.title: Numerical Simulation of Blasting Demolition of 16-Storied Structure

abstract.par: The separate element and common node model is setup to simulate reinforced concrete material at first, which could take fully account of the intensity difference of concrete and rebar. And then a 16-storied frame structure is build with this kind of model. The blasting demoLition process of the structure is simulated. The mechanism of collapse process and failure of column are analyzed. Finally, the scopes of collapse of calculation and practice are compared, and the errors of forwards and backwards distance are +11.9 and -16.6%. The simulation result has great practical significance to determine blasting parameters and optimize design.

keywords.kw: blasting demoLition, separate element, common node, unidirectional folding collapse, numerical simulation

article_rec.title: On Income Increasing Situation's Analysis and Countermeasure of Local Farmers - To Take Xuchang City for Instance

abstract.par: In the seventeenth session of the fifth plenary session, In order to accelerate the development of modern agriculture, expand the channels for peasants to increase income and improve the system of rural development Mechanism, "to promote agricultural modernization, urban and rural development" was included in the development goals of "second Five Year Plan ". "Twelfth Five-Year" plan is to pursue "people rich, ""universal and rapid increase in urban-rural income", which means the state will improve the income distribution and income distribution system reform will be promoted to more important. In the next five years, farmers will gradually increase to break the bottleneck, the pockets of farmers will be more drums.

keywords.kw: distribution system, countermeasure, the income of peasants

article_rec.title: On Modeling and the Interface Technology of the Reduction Device Based on Pro / E and ADAMS

abstract.par: An accurate three-dimensional model was estabLished by using Pre/Engineer software to complete the model and assembly of the Reducer. The model of the reduction device was imported into ADAMS / View by Mechanism/Pro, the interface of Pre/Engineer and ADAMS. This paper discussed questions concerning the process of the importing mentioned above, and thus it is important for reference by workers on the simulation of virtual prototyping.

keywords.kw: Reducer Pre/Engineer ADAMS Three-dimensional model Virtual Prototyping

article_rec.title: On the Construction of Pre-tensioned Hollow Beams

abstract.par: The construction of Hollow beams pre-tensioned is common in the construction of the bridge construction project, because it has a larger span, the characteristics of can be prefabricated, it has great promotional value. This article according to Beijing-Zhuhai Expressway Extension Project in the instance of bridge construction, respectively from the construction of steel strand, steel banding, formwork, concrete pouring, the conservation of plate girder, the measurements, the beam of slotting and stacking such nine aspects to Introduce the construction elements and key issues of the first prestressed concrete hollow beams (Group of tensioning and relax) , express their personal understanding and analysis of its.

keywords.kw: Tensioning, Prestressing, Plate girder

article_rec.title: On the Research of Pig Individual Identification and Automatic Weight Collecting System

abstract.par: This article takes pig individual identification and automatic weight collecting as an example, analyzes the data collecting process in the healthy pig feeding system. In this essay, the writer suggests to use RF devices to identify every pig and collect the weight automatically and save it in the database so as to analyze. It also discusses the basic theory of coordination between pig individual identification and automatic weight collecting, and analyzes the characteristics of this system and its appLication prospects to achieve healthy feeding.

keywords.kw: data collecting, radiofrequency, PLC, weight sensor

article_rec.title: Optimal Design and Analysis on Pricking Hole Mechanism with Planetary Elliptic Gears for Deep-Fertilization Liquid Fertilizer Applicator

abstract.par: In order to satisfy the demand of high working efficiency and running stabiLity of Liquid fertiLizer appLicator in the operation process, the pricking hole mechanism of Liquid fertiLizer appLicator with planetary elLiptic gears only was designed. Kinematics analysis model of the mechanism was created. Through theoretical derivation, the mechanism was analyzed using kinematics. By visual Basic 6.0 program, parameter optimization program was written which can display trajectory and attitude of the mechanism real-timely when pricking hole. Based on Design-Expert6.0.1 software, in accordance with optimization target and agricultural requirements, optimum parameter sets, which could satisfy the movement of the mechanism was obtained. Based on this experience, a set of parameters were chosen and co-simulation to pricking hole mechanism was carried out using Pro/E and ADAMS. The results indicated that the pricking hole mechanism designed on the basis of optimum parameters can meet the design requirements.

keywords.kw: pricking hole, elLiptic gear, optimization

article_rec.title: Optimal Design of Bridge Polarizing Relay

abstract.par: A mathematical model for optimal design of H type polarizing magnetic system with permanent magnet is setup. Its equivalent magnetic cirCuit and calculating method is presented. The optimal design results show the optimal magnetic efficiency and sensitivity of polarizing magnetic system are improved obviously.

keywords.kw: permanent magnet, bridge magnetic system, optimal design

article_rec.title: Optimization of Image Mosaic Algorithm for Large Workpiece Based on Multi-scale and Multi-resolution Search Strategy

abstract.par: To solve the problem of image measurement for work piece larger than the view field of the camera, it is necessary to obtain the panorama of the object to measure. Because the template matching algorithm for image mosaic based on similarity measure will lead to long time consumption, this paper proposed an optimization method based on multi-scale and multi-resolution to speed up the shrinkage of the matching area. This optimization of search strategy improved the efficiency of template matching greatly and laid a foundation for the image measurement of large work piece.

keywords.kw: image measurement, image mosaic, image pyramid, template matching, similarity measure

article_rec.title: Optimization of the Titania Humidity Sensor Equivalent Circuit Model Based on Genetic Algorithms

abstract.par: Taking the parameters of the Titania humidity sensor equivalent cirCuit model as an optimizing object, this paper proposes an optimization model to improve equivalent cirCuits based on genetic algorithms. ELitist strategy is added into the selection option of the algorithms, and fitness function is suitably adjusted. Thus, the operating efficiency and accuracy of the algorithms are enhanced, and a fitting curve and fitness function arrangement are obtained. The suitabiLity of equivalent cirCuits is proved intuitively by the fitting curve, and the operating effect of the algorithm is clearly expressed by the fitness function arrangement. An optimization process for improved genetic algorithms is reaLized with Matlab programming language.

keywords.kw: Humidity-sensitive Element, Equivalent CirCuit, Parameter Optimization, Genetic Algorithm, Matlab

article_rec.title: Optimizing Design of Four-Wheel Steering Vehicle Steering Trapezoid Based on MATLAB

abstract.par: This article designed a steering trapezoid of four-wheel steering construction vehicles with the MATLAB optimization toolbox. It solve out the relationship between the inside steering angle and outside steering angle in actual, to make the difference between the angle of inside wheel rotation in theoretical and angle of inside wheel rotation in actual minimum as the optimization goal, solving the optimal arm length and the optimal corner of the steering trapezoidal, ultimately get the best of the trapezoid body design.

keywords.kw: steering, Steering trapezium, Optimization, Matlab

article_rec.title: Optimum Method of Magneto-rheological Damper Design

abstract.par: Magneto-rheological (MR) damper has been concentrated for its adjustable damping force. Because it's complex nonLinear property and a lot of regulatory parameter, it is difficult to design a reasonable MR damper by simply process or experience. To solve this problem an optimum method has been presented in this article. The method based on flux equation of MR damper and common design targets which include maximal output damping force, dynamic range, power of excitation and consult volume of damper has been presented and been solved by multi-goal attach algorithm. To demonstrate the usage of the optimum method, an example about a valve model MR damper has been presented at the last.

keywords.kw: Magneto-rheological Damper, Optimum Method, Design

article_rec.title: Outage Performance of Cognitive Relay Networks Using Interweave-Underlay Approach

abstract.par: In this paper, we consider the cognitive relay network in which secondary users employ interweave-underlay approach to access to the unoccupied band of the primary user. In the network, relay nodes decode and forward the received signal to the destination in a repetition-based sCheme. We define the average outage probabiLity of the cognitive relay network, which is different from the opportunistic relaying network or cognitive relay network with interference constraints. We derive the average outage probabiLity of the source node in the cognitive relay network. There is an interesting phenomenon that the average probabiLity does not always decrease as spectrum sensing accuracy increases. We also show that the full diversity can also be achieved in the cognitive relay network.

keywords.kw: Cognitive Radio, Outage ProbabiLity, Cooperative Relay, Diversity Order

article_rec.title: Overall Scheme and Structural Design of Bolts Automatic Typewriter

abstract.par: Targeted for poor security, low efficiency of the existing equipment in a certain factory, a new automatic bolts typewriter based on hydromechatronics technology, which is suiting for 1-3 inChes or even greater specifications, 200-800mm or longer bolts typewriting. The overall sCheme, feeding and discharging mechanism of this typewriter is described in this paper. The typewriter has simple structure, easily adjusting properties and can working automatically or semi-automatically, which has high efficiency, low manufacturing costs, good performance, and high cost-effective.

keywords.kw: Bolt typewriter, HydrauLic, Automatic

article_rec.title: Parametric Analysis of New Tamping Device Based on the Mathematic Modeling

abstract.par: The requirements of higher train speed, safety and more smooth and comfortable travelLing are increasing strongly. This leads the need of predictive maintenance. Tamping machines have been used for this purpose. Tamping machines on the market are mostly mechanically driven. A new hydrauLically driven tamping device is proposed to overcome the Limitations of mechanically driven machines. A new type of rotary valve is also designed to improve the control of oscillating tamping cyLinder. Parametric analysis is carried out by estabLishing mathematic model. The results show that new tamper can meet the design requirement and the flexible adjustment of ampLitude and frequency is reaLized.

keywords.kw: tamping device, hydrauLic oscillator, rotary valve, mathematic modeLing, parametric analysis

article_rec.title: Partial Nitrification Regulated by Basicity in Low C/N Ratio Wastewater

abstract.par: In order to finish the partial nitrification of wastewater with high concentration ammonia and low concentration carbon in SBR smoothly, the research had been practised in reactor that short-cut nitrification developed in depth. The relationship between concentration and nitration rate of ammonia nitrogen could be studied by degree of nitration, which controlled by alkaLinity. NO2-/NH4+ during partial nitrification need to reach 1.3 on condition that concentration of ammonia nitrogen and rate of nitrite accumulation was given. As it turned out, alkaLinity shortage tended to bring nitrosation of ammonia nitrogen to an end by extremely low pH values. There was a Linear relationship between initial alkaLinity dosage and ammonia nitrogen nitration level. AlkaLinity requirement that adapt to inflow of anaerobic reactor during partial nitrification could be ascertained by means of formula ΔN (1.3+X) =1.3N;y (initial alkaLinity) =7.744ΔN -205.2(nitrite accumulation rate: X, ammonia nitrogen nitration demandΔN) .

keywords.kw: partial nitrification, alkaLinity, NO2-/NH4+, low C/N ratio

article_rec.title: Phase-Separation Floatation Spectrophotometric Determination of Trace Chlortetracycline in River

abstract.par: A green method for separating and enriching trace chlortetracycLine (CTC) in river by phase-separation floatation(PSF) spectro-photometry has been proposed, the principium was discussed. In this paper, the hydrophobic complex composed of Fe(III) and CTC was floated into organic phase under the optimal conditions: ultraviolet detector setting at 398 nm. Phase-separation reagent using 1.5 mol•L-1 sodium chloride, buffer solution of Tris-HCl(pH=7.0) as acidity regulator, tetrahydrofuran(THF) and ethanol absolute(4+1) as solvent. The Linear regression equation is A=2.59105C-0.0078, Linear range is from 5.010-7-1.310-5 mol•L-1, lower Limit of detection (LOD) was 3.3910-7 mol•L-1.

keywords.kw: phase-separation floatation (PSF), Spectrophotometry, chlortetracycLine (CTC)

article_rec.title: Physical and Mechanical Characteristics of Soft Soil in Lower Reaches of Yangtze River

abstract.par: Based on large numbers of geotechnical tests, the physical and mechanical characteristics of soft soil (including clay and silty clay) in the foundation of Sutong large bridge in lower reaChes of Yangtze River, Jiangsu province, China, is studied. The following conclusions can be drawn. Firstly, the variation coefficient of natural density, dry density, specific gravity of soil grain, saturation are small, the variation coefficient of natural water content, natural hole ratio, Liquid Limit, plastic Limit are generic, and the variation coefficient of plasticity index, compress module, compress coefficient, coherent strength, inner friction angle, the standard penetration test (SPT) are big. Secondly, there exist good Linear correlativity between natural density, hole ratio and natural water content, their correlativity coefficients are over 0.95. Thirdly, there is not Linear correlativity between plastic Limit and Liquid Limit, but there is better Linear correlativity between plastic Limit and Liquid Limit to clay. And the correlativity between plasticity index and Liquid Limit is good, and the correlativity coefficient is 0.90056. Fourthly, there exist good Linear correlativity between compress coefficient and natural hole ratio, natural water content, their correlativity coefficients are over 0.90. There exist good exponential correlativity between compress module and natural hole ratio, natural water content, their correlativity coefficients are over 0.85. Finally, there exist better exponential correlativity between coherent strength and natural density, natural hole ratio, the relativity between inner friction angle and natural density, natural hole ratio are not obvious.

keywords.kw: soil, parameter, bridge, Yangtze River

article_rec.title: Polarization-Space-Time Adaptive Processing for Clutter Suppression in Airborne Radar Systems

abstract.par: Clutter suppression is the serious problem for airborne surveillance radar systems. The paper analyses polarization-space-time(PST) joint domain adaptive processing technique for clutter suppress. Firstly, the received target signal model was estabLished in the case of completely polarized wave. Secondly, the optimal weighted vector is obtained using the maximal outputting SINR principle. Then, a new technique, with spectral analysis and resolution grid, is utiLized for deriving performance of clutter suppression. We demonstrate that the main factors which are affect on the performance of clutter rejection, i.e. the clutter degree of polarization, statistical spherical distance of Poincare sphere between target and clutter, Doppler frequency of target and input clutter and noise ratio. Finally, compared to STAP, the performance of polarization-space-time adaptive processing (PSTAP) is significantly better, especially in the case of a target slowly or tangentially moving. The simulation verifies the model correctness and conclusions.

keywords.kw: clutter suppression, spectracl domain alaysis, polarization space time adaptive processing

article_rec.title: Pollution Characteristics of Heavy Metal in the PM10 of Nanchang City

abstract.par: In order to improve the environmental quaLity of Nanchang city and provide scientific foundation for the municipal government to perfect the reconstruction of "Ecological Nanchang", the samples of PM10, flying dust from roads and construction sites were collected. The results showed that the PM10 concentration of the sampLing spot (Lijia ZHuang, an industrial district) was the highest (635.516µg/m3), the PM10 concentration in the main traffic district was higher than that in the residential district. The pollution of heavy metal elements in the PM10 of Nanchang City sHould be paid more attention to. The concentrations of Cu, Mn, Pb and Zn at Lijia ZHuang sampLing spot, an industrial district, were 104.545ng/m3 , 454.515ng/m3 , 325.028ng/m3, 626.728 ng/m3 respectively, which were much higher than that at the other two sampLing spots of Bayi Bridge (a main traffic spot) and Yongwai Zheng Street(a residential district). And the contamination degree of heavy metal elements were Zn> Mn > Pb>Cd>Cu>Cr>Ni successively. Industrial pollution was the main source of heavy metal contamination of atmospheric particles. In order to have better air quaLity in Nanchang City, it is advisable to further demoLishing the heavily polluting enterprises, decreasing the flying dust from roads and construction sites, eLiminating scrap vehicles and optimizing energy structure.

keywords.kw: PM10, heavy metal, air pollution, ICP-AES, microwave-heating digestion

article_rec.title: Preparation and Properties of Novel Sulfonated Poly (phenylene arylene) (SPA) Membranes for Fuel Cell Applications

abstract.par: A series of sulfonated poly(phenylene arylene) membranes were successfully prepared from 2,5-dichloro-3'-sulfobenzophenone (DCSB) and 2,2'-bis[4-(4-chlorobenzoyl)phenoxyl] perfluoropropane (BCPPF) through Ni(0)-catalyzed copolymerization. The membranes were obtained by solution casting method. They showed good mechanical strength and almost isotropic swelLing behavior. Membrane No.2 with an IEC of 2.0 meg/q showed high polymer electrolyte fuel cell (PEFC) performance data of open cirCuit voltage (OCV) of 0.95 V, cell voltage at 0.5 Acm-2 (V0.5=0.74 V), maximum output (Wmax=0.96 Wcm-2) at 90 oC, 80% relative humidity condition.

keywords.kw: sulfonated poly (phenylene arylene) membranes, Ni (0)-catalyzed copolymerization, polymer electrolyte fuel cell (PEFC) performance

article_rec.title: Principle and Analysis for the Novel Radial Translational Meshing Gear Motor

abstract.par: A novel radial translational meshing gear motor was introduced. The aim of this research is to design a new motor used in robot, micro mechanics and other devices with space restrict which integrates the meshing gear into the motor. Compared with conventional motors, the noticeable features of this motor are that the direction of electromagnetism force driving rotor is along radial direction, which structure shorten the drive chain and increased the respond speed, stabiLity at low speed, big output torque. In this paper, the operation principle and mechanism characteristics of this new motor are introduced. The finite element analysis is figured out, soLid model is founded and the static startup torque of the motor is calculated. Through the simulation and calculation results, the reasonabiLity and feasibiLity of this motor have been testified.

keywords.kw: radial translation meshing gear motor, finite element analysis, structure design, operation principle

article_rec.title: Processing Parameter Optimization for Injection Molding Products Based on Orthogonal Experimenter and Analysis

abstract.par: There are many quaLity-related factors in the manufacture of injection molding products of agriculture equipment. It is a trouble to find out the key factors and to optimize the process plan with these key factors. This study introduces a practice way: to design the factors test based on orthogonal experiment, and to analog test with software Mold flow MPI 6.0, then to handles the data with range and variance analysis theory, finally turn out the optimization process plan.

keywords.kw: injection molding, orthogonal experiment, processing parameter optimization

article_rec.title: Realization of Modified MPC Algorithm Based on Real Time Operating System

abstract.par: MPC design methods have found wide acceptance in industrial appLications and have been studied by academia. This paper presents a modified MPC algorithm that can appLied in real time operating system. By adding a new fuzzy strategy to MPC algorithm, we can control how and when to calculate the real time data, so we can increase or decrease calculation time with different conditions. When appLied this algorithm in real time operating system, we use some characteristic of operating system to ensure this fuzzy strategy not damaging basic feature of original MPC algorithm. Modified MPC algorithm performed by embedded systems is summarized.

keywords.kw: Dynamic matrix control, Real time Operating System, Algorithm

article_rec.title: Real-Time Measuring the Distance between Laser's Mouth and Workpiece

abstract.par: Use the method that combining with CCD and C#, reaLize measuring the distance of the laser'mouth and work piece in the laser direct metal deposition (DMD) formation technology[1]. Mainly introduces how to use the MicroPubLisher 5.5 RTV CCD real-time video the accumulation process and how to design image analysis software, Experiments show that the measurement data measured by the method combining with CCD and C# software is the same with the data which measured by ruler.

keywords.kw: directed Light manufacturing, CCD, C#, image analysis

article_rec.title: Real-Time Monitoring System of PLC for Production Line of Coin Cell Battery Based on LabVIEW

abstract.par: This paper describs how to use LabVIEW to implement the real-time monitoring system of PLC for production Line of coin cell battery. It introduces the principle of its composition and some command formats. The system implements the equipment production monitoring and analysis of field data by using the powerful data processing capabiLities and the good human-computer interface of LabVIEW software. The experiment proves that the system has high stabiLity and reaLizes production Line real-time monitoring various working parameters.

keywords.kw: LabVIEW, PLC, monitoring

article_rec.title: Real-Time On-Road Vehicle Detection Combining Specific Shadow Segmentation and SVM Classification

abstract.par: This paper presents a vision-based real-time vehicle detection approach. Combining segmenting the specific shadow area underneath the vehicle and using SVM-based classifier, the proposed approach is accurate and efficient for intelLigent vehicle. Experiment results with test dataset from real traffic scenes on freeways and urban roads are presented to illustrate the performance of this approach.

keywords.kw: Vehicle Detection, IntelLigent Vehicle, Vision, Vehicle Shadow Segmentation, SVM

article_rec.title: Recognition Algorithm of Laser Echo Signal in Tuyere Raceway Based on Multiwavelet Denoising and ICA

abstract.par: Laser measurement of echo signal in Tuyere Raceway is characterized by significant randomness. To extract the edge signal in Tuyere Raceway, the paper started by the testing of laser echo signal on its chaotic nature, aiming to identify its nonrandomness. Multiwavelet random translation algorithm was employed for noise reduction processing of echo signals to improve the signal vs. noise ratio, which was followed by ICA bLind source separation and the processing algorithm based on negative entropy. The test suggested that by the use of the recognition algorithm, the edge signal in the raceway could be better isolated. Being able to directly detect the edge of raceway, the method was proven to be of practical value.

keywords.kw: raceway, laser echo, multiwavelet, ICA

article_rec.title: Remote Sensing and GIS Application for Agricultural Land Quality Assessment of Yulin Prefecture

abstract.par: For optimum utiLization of available agricultural land resources on a sustainable basis, timely and reLiable information regarding their nature, extent and spatial distribution along with their potential and Limitations is very important. The efficiency and accuracy of data are improved when remote sensing data products and GIS are used. This study aims at overcoming the difficulty of contributing factors cannot be accurately quantified by using information objectively derivable from remote sensing images. This approach yield a comprehensive agricultural land quaLity (ALQ) assessment using indicators Like slope gradient, proportion of sandy land, water availabiLity, soil fertiLity, and land use types organized into three indices of pressure resistance, land state, and land use response. And this assessment takes account of topographic setting, land degradation risk, moisture, vegetation growing condition, and land use response of farmers. The assessment results demonstrate that the ALQ value is generally low for the whole YuLin prefecture. Two-thirds of the agricultural lands face a serious land degradation risk. As water availabiLity is a decisive factor influencing land productivity, ALQ is significantly correlated with the spatial distribution of water resources. Such assessment outcomes are essential for the prevention of land degradation and adjustment of agricultural structure to promote sustainable use of agricultural land.

keywords.kw: Agricultural Land QuaLity, Land QuaLity Indicators, Remote Sensing, GIS, YuLin Prefecture

article_rec.title: Research and Analyze on Belt-conveyors of Purely Mechanical Belt-broken Seizing Machine

abstract.par: Through the analysis of the status of belt-broken seizing machine and synthesizing the features of the common ones, designed a high reLiabiLity, minimal damage and purely mechanical belt-conveyors of belt-broken seizing machine according to the need of safe transport in the coal mine. The belt-broken seizing machine is made up of the agency of belt-broken signal capture and actuator that are purely mechanical. When occuring the belt-broken accident, broken belt drives the agency of belt-broken signal capture, which Links the actuator that connected to it to complete the action of seizing belt-broken. The agency of belt-broken also has a braking effect while Links the actuator, and achieve the dupLicate protection of the belt-broken with the actuator. Furthermore, the units has the advantages of that it is simple structure, easy to install, easy maintenance, sensitive and reLiable, avoid the second accident after the belt-conveyors broking, and ensure the safe transport of belt-conveyors in the coal mine.

keywords.kw: Purely Mechanical, Belt-conveyors, Belt-broken Seizing Machine, DupLicate Protection

article_rec.title: Research and Application of Hausdorff Metric Based i-v Vague Clustering Method

abstract.par: While vague clustering, as generaLization of fuzzy clustering, has been attracting more and more attentions, its generaLization, i-v Vague clustering, is still ignored by researChers. In order to achieve the clustering of i-v Vague set, a system clustering method is proposed, which is based on similarity generated by Hausdorff metric. The method firstly utiLizes Hausdorff metric to generate similarity between two i-v Vague values, and then estabLish similarity matrix. By setting a threshold, i-v Vague clustering is finally achieved through direct clustering. The feasibiLity of the method is vaLidated through analyzing of mechanical properties degeneration data about some material caused by fatigue damage. Furthermore, the potential appLication of the method to state identification is also discussed.

keywords.kw: i-v Vague set, hausdorff metric, clustering analyzing, state identification

article_rec.title: Research and Application of Virtual Real-Time Monitoring System of Well Testing Truck

abstract.par: Due to safe working requirement of well testing truck, a type of multifunctional virtual real-time general monitoring system is developed on the basis of deeply studying on the measuring principle of well testing truck, which can measure pulLing force, tension gradient, Lifting speed and well depth of the winch cable of well testing truck at the same time, and has the function of real-time condition analysis and monitoring, multi-parameter syncs synthetic, historical data playback, intelLigent alarming of underground instrument such as meeting resistance and meeting sticking, Liquid level, flow, near the wellhead and so on. This system provides not only a measuring platform but also a reLiable guarantee for safety production of well testing truck.

keywords.kw: well testing truck, winch, virtual instrument, real-time monitoring, strain, depth sensor, safe production

article_rec.title: Research and Design of Assembly Manufacturing Execution System for Aero-engine

abstract.par: To deal with the low efficiency and difficulty in production management and quaLity control of aero-engine assembly process, this paper proposed an Assembly Manufacturing Execution System (AMES) to reduce the assembly faults and improve the efficiency of management. According to ISA95 standard, it adopted activity models for assembly manufacturing and quaLity management to describe the functions of AMES. On the basis of activity model, it estabLished the architecture of AMES aiming at the characteristics of engine assembly field. The core data structure and operation flow of AMES was reaLized by object models of assembly production and quaLity management. A case of AMES was developed and appLied to the assembly workshop of aero-engine. The results show the AMES improves the efficiency of assembly operation and management.

keywords.kw: Assembly Manufacturing Execution System, ISA95, aero-engine assembly, activity model

article_rec.title: Research and Design of Network Ordering Tickets Mobile Payment Protocol

abstract.par: A mobile payment model of network ordering tickets is proposed, on the basis of which, this paper designed an efficient and safe protocol that can reaLize the function of network ordering tickets on the mobile terminal under the condition which satisfied the feature of mobile communication. Through the analysis the protocol satisfies non-repudiation, authentication and security. It is also simpler and has a wide range of appLication.

keywords.kw: Eefficient, Network ordering tickets, Security

article_rec.title: Research and Development of CAPP and Quality Control Integrated System

abstract.par: With the higher requirements on quaLity of products in the market, an integrated Q&P system based on the integration of CAPP (Computer-Aided Process Planning) with quaLity control technology is developed, and it respectively adopts SPC (Statistical Process Control) and process documents as its key quaLity control technology and direction. Then, the connection between network-based CAPP and quaLity control is estabLished by the integration of CAPP resources with quaLity resources of the whole enterprise. In addition, based on the third-party COM component and C# software develop platform, several software packages such as CAPP process documents compiLing, SPC and control charts are built to meet the demands for real-time data acquisition, statistic analysis and quaLity control in network-based manufacturing.

keywords.kw: CAPP, SPC, C#, quaLity control

article_rec.title: Research for Digital Automatic Test Technology of Hollow Axle in Motor Train Unit

abstract.par: According to research the characteristic, enlarge, and displayed-waveform character in ultrasonic test for fatigue crack, it shows that the ultrasonic test progress for Hollow Axle used in China railway industry is fit to the requirements.

keywords.kw: Hollow Axle, Ultrasonic testing, Non-destructive testing, technology

article_rec.title: Research of Direct Torque Control System within Full-speed Regions

abstract.par: A simulation system of direct torque control speed adjustment is introduced, it include field-weakening control. The simulation system reaLized induction-motor speed control within full-speed regions, constant torque adjustment less than foundation speed and constant power adjustment greater than foundation speed. The results of simulation show that system performance is excellent. The ripple and overshoot of speed are reduced, the four-quadrant characteristic of induction-motor varying speed is achieved successfully, the field-weakening control is very smooth. The simulation model has better reference meaning for researching direct torque control system within full-speed regions.

keywords.kw: direct torque control, adjustment speed, flux weakening, simulation

article_rec.title: Research of Intelligent Gas Perception Instrument Based on NDIR and RF Communication Technology

abstract.par: According to construct the mine gas wireless sensor system and overcome shortcomings of low accuracy, bad mobiLity and no information networking function that existing in conventional gas detectors, an intelLigent gas perception instrument (GPI) based on non-dispersive infrared detection (NDIR) and microwave RF communication technology was designed. The detailed design of GPI`s hardware and software was described in this paper. The principle and merits of the NDIR gas detection technology used in underground tunnel environment was introduced and an imported infrared sensor which can achieve high precision and wide-range detection was adopted to reaLize gas detection. The microwave RF transmission technology was chosen to reaLize the wireless transmission of the detected data after the study of transmission characteristics of electromagnetic waves in underground restricted space including frequency, attenuation, and power control. Test results show that its detection accuracy is 0.01% when the concentration is less than 10% and communication distance can reach 120m with 915.2 MHz frequency and 10dBm transmission power. This GPI can perceive miner`s safe environment and reaLize active security.

keywords.kw: gas perception, wireless monitoring, NDIR, RF communication, internet of things

article_rec.title: Research of Military Logistics Management Information System Based on the Integrated Technology of Workflow and GIS

abstract.par: It was played an important role in the appLication of physics distribution management information that the workflow technology and the GIS technology unified separately with the miLitary physics distribution management system. Therefore, combining the workflow technical with the GIS technology in the corresponding miLitary physics distribution information management system, it was not only satisfied the current present situation, but also improved and enhanced the system. It was introduced the key technologies, the system architecture and the design concept.

keywords.kw: workflow, workflow technology, GIS, miLitary physics distribution management information system

article_rec.title: Research of Scheduling Algorithm Based on Priority in Data Nodes of Cloud Storage

abstract.par: Based on a school's teaching resources and video-on-demand services in schools, through building a cloud environment and studying the storage layer's video data storage of the cloud storage and the management manner, this paper proposes a sCheduLing algorithm based on Priority(SAP). According to the priority of data block, the algorithm sChedules on mastering the supply and demand of data block comprehensively and accurately, and solves the system's launch delay and the continuity of streaming media player.

keywords.kw: Cloud storage, data nodes, sChedule, Priority

article_rec.title: Research on Active Synchronous Control System of Hydraulic Press and Its Reliability Analysis

abstract.par: The synchronous control system is the essential device to the forging hydrauLic press, closely with the practical appLication of synchronous control problem, an active synchronism program is proposed based on multi-point driver. And its reLiabiLity is analyzed and calculated, and provides reference for the design.

keywords.kw: The forging hydrauLic press, Synchronization control, ReLiabiLity

article_rec.title: Research on an Intelligence Q/A Expert System Based on the Bayesian Reasoning Mechanism

abstract.par: With the development of network education, the onLine question/answering (Q/A) system plays more and more important role. The traditional Q/A system need the teaChers to answer questions, which is low efficient. This paper introduces a model of an intelLigence Q/A system which is based on the expert system theory. And it analyzes how to construct the knowledge database, third it researChes on the Bayesian reasoning mechanism. In a certain extent, the extensibiLity and the intelLigence to the system are greatly enhanced.

keywords.kw: intelLigence Q/A expert system, reasoning mechanism, rule-based knowledge database

article_rec.title: Research on BP-PID Controller for the Motion Synch Recording and Simulation

abstract.par: Synch recording and simulation of motion has many appLication realms. It is of certain significance to study it systematically. Based on a set of existing hydrauLic servo driven 3-DOF(Degree Of Freedom) synchronous on-Line recorder and simulator, The motion measure algorithm is deduced. the adaptive BP-PID controller is designed accordingly. The experiment is carried out also and the results prove the algorithm is correct and the controller's design is fully a success.

keywords.kw: Synch recording, simulation, recorder, simulator, algorithm, BP-PID controller

article_rec.title: Research on Data Acquisition and Analysis of Circular Tests on Numerical Control Machine Tools Based on NC System

abstract.par: According to the characters of openness, modularization and interface of the NC control SINUMERIK 840D on machine tools, we use MPI, DDE to communicate/data-exchange with SINUMERIK 840D. And a data acquisition system for circular tests on NC machine tools is designed and developed. Based on ISO 230-4-2005 standard for circular tests, some evaluation parameters of circular tests is introduced. And it is verified tHough simulated data and real data.

keywords.kw: SINUMERIK 840D, Circular Tests, Data Acquisition, Feature Extraction

article_rec.title: Research on Fault Location of Power Cable with Wavelet Analysis

abstract.par: This article researChes for 10kV transmission cable form the ground substation to the underground central substation in the coal mine. The transient traveLing wave signal of the cable fault is disposed by the wavelet transformation based on the cable traveLing wave transmission theory. The traveLing wave head of the cable fault can be more accurately extracted after the wavelet transform. The corresponding sample point can be found out, and then the time of the wave head reaChed the detection point can be accurately calculated by sampLing. In the end, the fault distance can be calculated by using the one-port fault location method. The ranging accuracy is improved by this method.

keywords.kw: Wavelet analysis, Fault Location, TraveLing wave

article_rec.title: Research on Faults Diagnostic Technology of Hydraulic System Based on Parameters Measurement

abstract.par: Poor visibiLity of the hydrauLic drive system, usually to bring some troubleshooting difficult. In this paper, parameter measurement based fault diagnosis method, through quantitative analysis of system parameters and logical analysis, to achieve the accurate diagnosis of the hydrauLic system failure, fault diagnosis with scientific accuracy and rapidity. The technology to significantly reduce the equipment assembly and disassembly work, reducing the skill level of maintenance personnel requirements of the more traditional method of fault diagnosis significantly improve the efficiency, the promotion sHould have practical value.

keywords.kw: Fault Diagnosis, Parameter Measurement, System Failure of HydrauLic

article_rec.title: Research on Feed System of Phi630 Steel Pipe Chamfering Machine

abstract.par: The working principle of the mechanical feed system of Φ630 automatic pipe chamfering machine is introduced in this paper, and the working state of the feed system is analyzed in order to provide a theoretical basis for the servo control of feed system. The detection principle of the feed system and the detection method of the feed speed and displacement are also emphasized, and the calculating formula of the electronic gear ratio is presented to offer theoretical reference for equipment site commissioning.

keywords.kw: feed system, servo motor, electric gear ratio, pulse equivalent

article_rec.title: Research on Hydrology Time Series Prediction Based on Grey Theory and epsilon-Support Vector Regression

abstract.par: Hydrology time series prediction is significant. It is not only helpful to set the planning in daily configuration works of water resources, but also provides guidance for leaders to make decision, especially in some special case such as flood and seriously lack water. In order to solve the imbalance complexity of prediction model and complexity of samples and raise forecasting accuracy, combined prediction model based on support vector machine and grey theory was proposed. The grey time series prediction method was used to reduce complexity of samples and the support vector machine regression was used to reduce complexity of prediction model. The incoming water time series of MinJiang River in 1937-2002 were taken as the sample to be analyzed. The results show that the combined algorithm of e-support vector regression and grey theory has better effects in simulate of trend data and the random data in medium and long-term forecasting.

keywords.kw: support vector regression, grey theory model, time series prediction, accuracy, complexity

article_rec.title: Research on Index Portfolio Optimized Replication Model Based on Liquidity Penalty Factor

abstract.par: The stock and portfoLio Liquidity are directly relating to the impact cost of portfoLio adjustments, with the lack of depth in the market, it may cause the failure of index repLication. In order to solve this problem, under the condition of considering that there is no worse tracking error, more funds are allocated on Liquid assets by combining with the Liquidity risk. In this paper, an optimized repLication model based on Liquidity penalty factor is estabLished to control the impact cost of market, reduce the tracking error and improve the return rate of portfoLio, and Hu-Shen 300 security index is taken as an example to indicate the feasibiLity and necessity of Liquidity improved method under the condition that there is no obviously worse index tracking effect.

keywords.kw: Optimized RepLication, Tracking Error, Liquidity Penalty Factor, Hu-Shen 300 Security Index

article_rec.title: Research on Metal Magnetic Memory Testing Technology in Welding Joint of Structure Train (Railway High-Speed Motor Train Set) Locomotive

abstract.par: Metal Magnetic Memory Technology (MMMT) can find out the residual stress concentration zone and provide early diagnosis for ferromagnetic structure components. The appLication of MMMT in welded joints inspection has been investigated and compared with the result of X-ray inspection in this paper. The appLicabiLity of MMMT in welded joints NDT is also analyzed. The experimental results show MMMT can find out the defects in the welded joints. It can also predict the dangerous zone in the welding joints.

keywords.kw: Metal Magnetic Memory Testing (MMMT), Welded joints, X-ray inspection

article_rec.title: Research on Milling Globoidal Indexing Cam Based on Pro / NC

abstract.par: For the difficult machining of globoidal indexing cam, it is analyzed specifically combined with the characteristics of material and heat treatment. Its soLid modeLing is given by appLication of Pro / E. Machining simulation is carried out by setting processing parameters of NC module. With the function of NC machining measuring, it can Check whether there is the phenomenon on over-cutting. Results show that the design of globoidal indexing cam is appropriate. Finally, the processing code is generated by post-processing, so as to provide the necessary procedures for the actual processing. And the difficult problem of the programming is solved.

keywords.kw: globoidal indexing cam, machining simulation, Check, post-processing

article_rec.title: Research on Modeling for YiLiuShi NeutraLization Reaction Process

abstract.par: It is very important for control system analysis and design to estabLish model and simpLified model of YiLiuShi neutraLization reaction process, which is characterized by critical nonLinearity and strong disturbance. In this paper, the nonLinear model with state-space expression is built based on neutraLization reaction mechanism, and its model is simpLified on the working point. Secondly, the controllabiLity, observabiLity and stabiLity are analyzed. The simulation results show that the simpLified model is suitable for YiLiuShi neutraLization reaction process analysis and design.

keywords.kw: YiLiuShi neutraLization reaction, ModelLing, System anlysis

article_rec.title: Research on Numerical Simulation of High Temperature Heat Pipe

abstract.par: The paper researChes the strong heat transfer numerical simulation to the transitional period of medium and low temperature of high temperature heat pipe heat exchanger. It sets the calculation model of the headquarters according to the characteristics of heat transfer of heat pipe heat exchanger, and forecasts the fluid temperature field distribution outside of pipe reasonably and accurately by FULENT software. The results show that heat exchange performance in hot will keep steady well in the early and decLine significantly in the late by changing heat pipe amount or increasing flow, and the change in cold is small, but it will keep steady well in the early and decLine significantly in the late both in hot and cold by increasing import and export temperature. It lays the foundation for the theoretical research and promoting appLication to high temperature heat pipe heat exchanger.

keywords.kw: heat pipe heat exchanger, numerical simulation, temperature field

article_rec.title: Research on OPC UA Based on FDT/DTM and EDDL

abstract.par: Currently, there are two major technologies: FDT/ DTM and EDDL in the field bus device integration domain. But they are not consistent with each other, and lack of integration between two kinds of techniques. This paper describes that integrates these two technologies into OPC UA cLient/server architecture, and gives mapping of the DTM to the OPC UA address space node and EDD to OPC UA address space node. The method will not only help device manufacturers but also to users.

keywords.kw: OPC UA, FDT/DTM, EDDL, server address space, device integration

article_rec.title: Research on Potential Energy Recovery of 16T Wheeled Hybrid Excavator

abstract.par: System translates the arm/boom/buck's potential energy into electrical energy and then the electrical energy is stored in a storage device. It develops a set of energy management strategy to make the recoverable energy recycLing efficiently. This energy of traditional excavator is lost in the form of heat energy. It is wasteful and makes the component's Life. Researching on this system not only conform to the current topic of energy crisis, but also mate with the actual engineering, so it is significant to research that.

keywords.kw: Hybrid Excavator, Potential Energy Recovery, Arm, Energy Saving

article_rec.title: Research on Random Noise Attenuation in Transform Domain

abstract.par: Radom noise attenuation method by contourlet transform is researChed in this paper. Compared with wavelet transform, the contourlet transform proposed by Do and VetterLi offers a high degree of directionaLity and anisotropy, and it represents images sparser. Consequently, contourlet transform can obtain better denoising result than wavelet transform when a simple thresholding sCheme is appLied on the contourlet coefficients. But Contourlet-based image denoising method always introduces artifacts due to the lack of translation invariance of the contourlet transform. And hence, cycle spinning is often used to compensate for the lack of translation invariance of the contourlet transform. Experiments on test images show that the contourlet transform denoising method using hard threshold can obtain about 1~2 dB higher PSNR values than classical 2-D separate wavelet transform. And denoising progress by contourlet transform with cycle spinning technology can reach more outstanding denoising results than that of witHout.

keywords.kw: wavelet transform, contourlet transform, denoising

article_rec.title: Research on Recycling of Numerical Control Machine Tools

abstract.par: According to the idea of green manufacturing, this paper researChed about CNC machine tools made of recycle and reuse toward the next 5 to 10 years a large-scale NC machine tools scrap recycLing potential resources. Then it also analyses the flow chart of CNC recycLing and reusing, proposed evaluation method of CNC machine tools recycLing and reuse which based on fuzzy analytic hierarchy process. It estabLishes a comprehensive and rational recycLing of CNC machine tools evaluation index system, develops evaluation prototype system for recycLing CNC machine tools. This paper provides theoretical and technical reference for recycLing and reuses the waste CNC machine tools.

keywords.kw: CNC, Fuzzy Analytic Hierarchy Process, RecycLing, Reusing

article_rec.title: Research on Rigidity of the Giant Forging Hydraulic Press on the Impact of Synchronization Performance

abstract.par: With MARC software, analyzed the rigidity of hydrauLic press on the impact of synchronous performance, the results show that: in the absence of synchronization control device and eccentric load operation, the moving beam had a great deflection, it can't guarantee accuracy of product processing. This also shows that the synchronous control system is the essential device to the giant forging hydrauLic press, which will directly determine the quaLity of the product.

keywords.kw: The giant hydrauLic press, Rigidity, Synchronization control

article_rec.title: Research on Small Unmanned Four-rotor Control Based on AIC

abstract.par: Taking the small unmanned four-rotor as a research object, the dynamic model of the small four-rotor was built according to Newton-Euler formaLism. Adaptive Inverse Control (AIC) Theory was used in the control of the small unmanned four-rotor for the first time and the attitude stabiLization control of the small unmanned four-rotor was reaLized on the experimental platform. The simulation results and platform control experiment indicate that AIC is robust in the attitude control of the small unmanned four-rotor.

keywords.kw: small unmanned four-rotor, adaptive inverse control (AIC), modeLing, N-LMS algorithm, simulation, platform fLight experiment

article_rec.title: Research on Soft Switching Boost Converter

abstract.par: This text introduce a sort of new soft switching Boost converter. The conventional Boost converter generates switching loss at turn on and off. So the whole system's efficiency is reduced. The proposed converter utiLizes soft switching method using an auxiLiary switch and resonant cirCuit. Therefore, the converter reduces switching loss lower than the hard switching. The proposed soft switching Boost converter can be appLied to photovoltaic system, power factor correction and so forth. The operation principles of the converter and the conditions for reaLization of soft switching are analyzed in detail, simulation analysis is given by the MATLAB/SimuLink. It s simulation results prove that all the switChes in soft switching state and the efficiency of the converter is improved.

keywords.kw: Boost converter, soft switching, MATLAB/SimuLink

article_rec.title: Research on Spindle Bearings State Recognition of CNC Milling Machine Based on Noise Monitoring

abstract.par: Relationship between spindle running noise and health state of spindle bearings of CNC milLing machine is studied. With an acoustic sensor system, the spindle noise signals are sampled both in normal state and fault state of bearings. With three input characteristics abstracted from the signals, such as mean of absolute value, power and variance, a three-layer Back-Propagation neural network to recognize the bearing running state is built up and trained. The optimized number of hidden layer nodes of the neural network is determined by comparison test. It is proved by the experimental results that the noise signals monitoring is effective in recognition of spindle bearings health state.

keywords.kw: Bearings State Recognition, CNC Machine Tools, Noise, Neural Network

article_rec.title: Research on Template-Based Parameterized Structure Design for Drawing Dies

abstract.par: The structure design of drawing dies is a very compLicated and knowledge-intensive process. This paper describes a template-based parametric design system for drawing dies which adopt template as the die design knowledge base and instantiate it to complete the design of the main components of drawing die. Some key technologies such as the template technology, the parameterization technology and the top-down assembly design technique have been studied. The template for drawing dies is defined by using the "top skeleton" assembly structure, and the associative geometry-driven design and parameter-driven design of dies structure is reaLized by adopting WAVE technique and parameterized design method. The design process of template-based drawing dies structure is estabLished and the rapid design of structure is implemented by applying UG secondary development. At last, effectiveness of our method is verified by some examples.

keywords.kw: Automobile panel, Template, Drawing die, Parameterized design

article_rec.title: Research on the Applicability of Solar Energy-Ground Source Heat Pump in Different Regions of China

abstract.par: The development potential of solar energy resource, cLimatic characteristics and soil temperature conditions are various in different areas of China, which brings some difficulties in the promotion and appLication of solar energy-ground source heat pump (GSHP). This paper has analyzed the distribution of solar energy resource in different areas of China, as well as China's cLimate and soil thermal characteristics, and the result shows that resources of solar energy are abundant in most parts of China, the annual average temperature of ground surface can be adopted as the soil initial temperature for the design of geothermal system. Experiments and simulation studies on the solar energy-GSHP project have been carried out in terms of four representative cities, and it turns out that the solar energy-GSHP system can be used in Northeast China and North China, in most parts of Northwest China and in parts of Eastern China, meanwhile it can achieve good economical and social benefit, but it is not appropriate to use the solar energy-GSHP system in some cities of southern China such as Guangdong, Yunnan, Fujian, Hainan, etc.

keywords.kw: Solar energy-ground source heat pump (GSHP), Solar radiation, Sharacteristics of soil thermal storage, Geographic features

article_rec.title: Research on the Emotion Recognition Based on the Fuzzy Neural Network in the Intelligence Education System

abstract.par: With the network education becomes more and more popular, people pay more attention to the intelLigence of the education system. This paper put out focus on the fuzzy neural network (FNN) applying to the emotion recognition. The method works by doing emotional features extraction first, then training the FNN using lots of the features data, third using the FNN to recognize emotion. Finally the paper proposes a structure of the intelLigence education system which includes an emotion module. This module can recognize the students' emotion by analyzing their expression, which can help the system to make an appropriate choice of teaching strategy. The combination of the emotion module with the intelLigence education can serve the purpose of improving the quaLity of teaching and studying.

keywords.kw: FNN, emotion recognition, intelLigence education system

article_rec.title: Research on the Load Characteristics of Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor

abstract.par: In the actual permanent magnet synchronous motor servo system, the load changes is a major factor that affects system performance. In this paper, a PMSM vector control system model is estabLished in Matlab/SimuLink environment. By adjusting the parameters of controller, simulation and analysis are done on the load changes that may appear. The results demonstrate that the system is stable, with good load characteristics.

keywords.kw: permanent magnet synchronous motor, vector control, PI control, simulation

article_rec.title: Research on the Probability of Joint Investment Based on Logistic Regression Analysis

abstract.par: In this paper, based on Logistic Regression, Select the pubLished financing event as sample in the AVCJ's AsianfnFN database. And aslo study the factors which impact on the Joint investment in Empirical way, come to the result that the amount of the project financing, The number of years in Chinese investment and industry experience pay an important in whether the occurrence of joint investment at the 0.05 level. The age of the invested projects is at the edge of statistical significance. Total assets under management and number of industry investment are not significant In deciding whether take place to the joint investment. the model accuracy is 92.4%.

keywords.kw: Logistic regression, joint investment, probabiLity, factors

article_rec.title: Research on the Yield Formation Characteristics of Zheng-Wheat 7698 under the Super-High Yield Condition
