abstract.par: In Line with the promotion of Zheng-wheat 7698 with strong gluten, this article analyzed the growth of Zheng-wheat 7698 and the relevant super-high yield cultivation technique according to the researChes in the field and experiments in small areas. The results show as follow: under the super-high yield condition, Zheng-wheat 7698 had a long period of grain filLing, and the weight of grain in filLing stage increased fast, with an average of 2.1 grams of one tHousand grains per day, the leaves of Zhegn-wheat 7698 stuck out and had good Light transmittance, and the top-three leaves had long functional period, under the super-high yield condition, the index of the leaf area came to 7.63, the index of the top-three leaves was 5.01 and the index of the flag leaf was 1.69, the dry matter weight of Zheng-wheat 7698 was mainly from the photosynthate after flowering, Zheng-wheat 7698 10500kg/ hm2, the structure of its output was 6480000 spikes / hm2, 37.5 grains per spike, and one tHousand grains' weight was 47.2g; 9750∼10485kg/ hm2, the structure of its output was 5880000 spikes / hm2, 38.1 grains per spike, and one tHousand grains' weight was 46.6g.

keywords.kw: super-wheat, Zheng-wheat 7698, leaf area index, yield structure

article_rec.title: Research on Universal NC Program Processor for CNC System

abstract.par: NC program processing is important in CNC machining. Nowadays, CNC systems support only CNC builder-specific NC program input and this Limits the potential appLication of many NC programs that have the same functions with different formats. In order to manage the variety of NC programs available, a universal NC program processor was developed that can accept and process any kind of NC program, and a prototype system is built to evaluate the proposed design followed by a successful case study.

keywords.kw: NC program processor, NC specification dictionary, Interpreting engine, Canonical machining function

article_rec.title: Research on Vibration and Lever-Arm Effect Influence to Onboard SAR Centre Motion Parameters

abstract.par: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) is an active microwave imaging sensor, which is capable of outputting high resolution radar images even if under extreme weather conditions. It can work in full time and in all weathers with far-range, broad sensing, multi-polarization, multi-brand, variable visual angle and high penetrabiLity characteristics, greatly enhancing the radar capabiLity of obtaining information. The antenna of SAR during imaging is required to keep moving rectiLinearly with constant speed, while the space craft's body usually has irregular vibrations, which brings difficulty for stable imaging, so it is necessary to carry out motion compensating. In this paper, based on the motion parameters output from IMU on the space craft, real motion information of the centre of SAR antenna is calculated for motion compensating. First, vibration analysis is carried out by using finite element method to get the transfer function from IMU centre to SAR, and then motion transfer relationship is built between IMU and the antenna centre with consideration on the vibration and lever-arm effect. Simulation is given in typical vibration case, which could provide good reference for onboard SAR design and manufacture.

keywords.kw: Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR), Space Craft, Vibration Analysis, Lever-Arm Effect, Transfer Function

article_rec.title: Returns Acquiring and HRRP Imaging for Radar Ship Target Recognition

abstract.par: Target recognition is one of the must trends of the sea surveillance radar, and the accuracy of target recognition is dependent on the radar's acquiring capabiLity of target electromagnetic signature. Firstly, according to the low-resolution pulse mode of the sea surveillance radar, this paper studies a new technique of single-channel hard sampLing and multi-channel soft extracting to provide versatile return data simultaneously for the target detection, display and coarse-classification. Many statistic features such as silk afterglow, notch, bounce and twist can be extracted from high-precision return sequences, which can be used for coarse target classification. A field programmable gate array (FPGA) algorithm of intermediate frequency (IF) direct sampLing and high resolution range profile (HRRP) imaging is also proposed in the paper aiming at the wide-band imaging mode of the sea surveillance radar. The scatter centers distribution features can be extracted from HRRP image to evaluate the length and width of the target. AssembLing the two working modes, a method of the informational radar display & control terminal (IRDACT) is performed, which can improve the recognition capabiLity of the sea surveillance radar.

keywords.kw: target recognition, high-precision return sequence, wide-band imaging, scatter centers distribution, informational radar display & control terminal (IRDACT)

article_rec.title: Road Signal Intersection Congestion Mechanism Analysis

abstract.par: Based on the traffic characteristics of the road plane intersection, this paper carries out analysis on signal intersection congestion mechanism.

keywords.kw: signal intersection, congestion, mechanism

article_rec.title: Robot Navigation Based on Multi-sensor Data Fusion

abstract.par: This paper mainly focuses on a multi-sensor system for combining data from infrared and ultrasonic sensors in the navigation of coal mine rescue robots, meanwhile a navigation method is presented. A multiple infrared and ultrasonic sensor system has been developed for complete coverage navigation of a robot. By fusing the aspects of different sensors with different beam-widths, more efficient colLision avoidance behavior in robot control can be obtained. A navigation method using TOF, ampLitude characteristic and trigonometry are appLied to solve such problems as obstacle detection, obstacle avoidance and path-planning. Simulation results demonstrate that the robot is capable of bypassing obstacles agilely and reach the destination smoothly and reLiably, at the same time the precise position and orientation information of the robot are updated using the previous robot locaLization studies.

keywords.kw: Coal mine rescue robot, navigation, Obstacle avoidance, Multi-sensor

article_rec.title: Root-Soil System Domain Knowledge Constructing Method Based on Relational Analysis of Single Impact Factor

abstract.par: Through analyzing the problems existing in simulating root growth under external effect, regarding the feature that external effect can be decomposed into single impact factor (SIF), the root-soil system domain knowledge constructing method has been raised based on relational analysis of SIF. This method is based on external effects model database, mines the SIF data and builds Links among them, adopts multidimensional association rule of Apriori algorithm and threshold selection to select effective SIF, uses MATLAB to quantize data, and then constructs a domain knowledge database of SIF's effects to root growth, ultimately, uses OpenAlea and combines a root growth model to achieve the visuaLized simulation of root growth. Take soil compaction as an external effect to carry on a comparison experiment, the result shows that this method can prompt to complete a visuaLized simulation of root growth efficiently.

keywords.kw: single impact factor, domain knowledge, root-soil system, association rule, visuaLized simulation

article_rec.title: Scene Classification Combining Low-level and Semantic Modeling Strategies

abstract.par: Scene classification is an important issue in the field of computer vision. AltHough considerable progress has been made, it remains a challenging issue. Most of the current scene classification approaChes are based on either low-level or semantic modeLing strategies. This paper presents a novel scene classification approach based on combining low-level and semantic modeLing strategies. The experimental results show that the proposed approach performs competitively against previous methods across three pubLicly and commonly used data sets.

keywords.kw: scene classification, low-level modeLing strategy, bag-of-features, SVM, feature combination

article_rec.title: Second-Order Siding Mode Control with Fuzzy Compensator for a Magnetic Levitation System

abstract.par: This paper presented a second-order sliding mode controller (SOSMC) with the fuzzy control of a magnetic ball suspension system (MBSS). To makes system robustness, the SOSMC controller which improves the chattering phenomenon. This SOSMC controller combines the fuzzy control which rejects the parameter variations and external disturbances. This method utilizes Lyapunov function to guarantee the system asymptotically stable. Finally, we employ the experiments to validate the proposed method.

keywords.kw: Second-order sliding mode control (SOSMC), magnetic levitation system, Fuzzy control, Lyapunov function

article_rec.title: Separation of Cortical Arteries and Veins Using Intrinsic Optical Signals Extracted by Canonical Correlation Analysis

abstract.par: This paper presents an artery-vein separation method in cerebral cortical image with optical imaging of intrinsic signals. The method utiLizes three distinct intrinsic signal sources including low frequency oscillation, respiration and heartbeat, which are extracted from the recorded optical signals by temporal canonical correlation analysis, to reflect the artery-vein difference in temporal domain. Each signal source constructs a correlation-coefficient map to reveal the spatial structure of a specific type of vessel. Low frequency oscillation and heartbeat sources reveal the arterial structure while respiration source reveals the venous structure. Based on the three feature maps, classification of vessel types is achieved by SVM on segmented vessel network. With hand-labeled arteries and veins as the reference standard, the algorithm gives 95.7% true positive rates (TPR) and 7.5% false positive rates (FPR) for the arteries, as well as 92.5% TPR and 4.1% FPR for the veins when tested on ten sets of image sequence. Comparison with previously reported methods demonstrates that this method improves the artery-vein separation performance.

keywords.kw: Artery-vein Separation, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Vessel Segmentation, Optical Imaging

article_rec.title: Silicon Content and Isothermal Quenching Process' Influence on High Silicon Cast Steel Organization and Performance

abstract.par: In order to strengthen the high siLicon cast steel, we research the influence of high siLicon cast steel heat treatment process of microstructure and mechanical properties by using appLication of relevant laboratory equipment, instruments and methods of the siLicon content. The results show that in the scope of the experiment, when siLicon content is about 2.65%, we can get no carbide austenitizing organizations composition of ferrite and rich carbon austenite, when the temperature and time of austenitizing is 900 °C 120min and the temperature and time of Isothermal quenching is 320 30-120min °C, we can obtain better organization and comprehensive mechanical properties. A new generation of high siLicon cast steel has high performance-to-price. It can be used in mining, power, cement, building materials, railway and other industrial areas.

keywords.kw: high siLicon cast steel, the microstructure, Mechanical properties, SiLicon content, the isothermal quenching, Temperature, time

article_rec.title: Simulation and Experimental on Valve-less Piezoelectric Pump with Hackle Chamber

abstract.par: A valve-less piezoelectric pump with hackle chamber (HC) is presented. The chamber bottom of the pump is designed as a waves shape. The HC and the opposite piezoelectric vibrator constitute a series of hackle shape ducts in the chamber. Different flow resistances are produced between the suction stroke and the discharge stroke of the pump. The different flow resistances will generate net flow when the pump works. The presented pump is successful to minimize the valve-less piezoelectric pump by eLiminating the regular diffuse/nozzle elements outside the chamber. The theory on the pump working is analyzed. The flow field in chamber is simulated for an intuition. Finally, to verify the theory, a group of tests are performed.

keywords.kw: piezoelectric pump, valve-less, flow resistance, hackle chamber

article_rec.title: Size Effect of Element in Structural Blasting Demolition

abstract.par: Performed the size effect of the unit in numerical simulation of blasting demoLition. Considered three elemental sizes, which were 10, 20 and 40 cm. Adopt 40 cm element, the structure was damaged more seriously. This resulted in the bigger error in predicting the demoLition scope. The collapsed time was shorter, and the structural rush distance was farther. When adopted 10 cm, a great number of elements were divided. It is impossible to calculate for normal computer. Adopt 20 mm, the computational accuracy were increased on one hand, and ensured the feasibiLity of calculation.

keywords.kw: blasting demoLition, finite element, numerical simulation, size effect

article_rec.title: Size Measurement Based on Structured Light Sensor

abstract.par: In this paper, a 2D size measurement model for regular parts based on structured Light sensor is built. This measurement system can be used for regular shape parts such as rectangle, circle, ring and so on. The key technology of this model are discussed. An experiment is designed and the result shows that the measurement system based on structured Light sensor inherited the advantages of both machine vision and structured Light. Furthermore, the model can be used widely to measure and detect the size of laminar type parts on assembLing Line.

keywords.kw: Structured Light Sensor, Machine Vision, 2D Size Measurement

article_rec.title: SMA-13 Target Mix Design

abstract.par: This article unifies the construction experience of SMA-13 bituminous pavement project, raw material selected, the determination of Marshall experiment target, the gradation optimization, the determination of best oilstone and goal mixture ratio design examination as well as aspects and so on introduced the SMA-13 road surface goal mixture ratio design.

keywords.kw: Road, asphalt pavement, SMA-13, Target Mix

article_rec.title: Small Satellite Magnetism Control for Velocity Damping

abstract.par: Velocity damping is the process in which the angular velocity of the satelLite sHould be controlled to reduce expeditiously after being released from the rocket. The velocity damping control process is of great importance for the subsequent satelLite three-axis attitude stabiLization. Based on magnetic control laws of minus-dot-B and PID, the velocity damping control processes under three scenarios with different executive mechanisms, namely magnetic control, magnetic control with a momentum wheel, and magnetic control with micro thrusters, are simulated and analyzed. The results indicate that the time for magnetic control in velocity damping process is the longest, while for the magnetic control with micro thrusters the shortest. Magnetic control with a momentum wheel is stable and the time is between magnetic control and magnetic control with thrusters. PID is much better than minus-dot-B in accuracy and stabiLity, but the velocity damping time is longer. The paper not only verifies the feasibiLity of magnetic control used in velocity damping process, but also provides a reference for choosing the executive mechanism and the control law.

keywords.kw: Velocity damping, Minus-dot-B, PID, Micro thruster

article_rec.title: Sound Investigation and Protection of Sound for Vocal Workers in Quake-Hit Areas

abstract.par: Because of the accelerated pace of Life, work pressure, environmental pollution and working or recreational activities grow quickly, making the incidence of voice disease gradually upward trend. During the earthquake area, the incidence of disease rise rapidly, especially teaChers are high risk population. Psychogenic voice disorder is a kind of psychological fear and repression which has not been released, causing voice disorder. Due to environmental, psychological, and many other reasons, the voice is fatigue, combined with voice over use and so on, thus the voice organ is prone to organic disease. So it is particularly important to prevent voice disorders, care for disaster education, especially the teaChers.

keywords.kw: Earthquake, Voice, Survey, Protect

article_rec.title: Stiffness Analysis of a Building Drum Linkage Mechanism

abstract.par: The radial telescopic tire building drum is composed of a group of planar Linkage mechanism. The stiffness of Linkage mechanism makes a great contribution to the stiffness of building drum. Aimed at a 2-DOF planar parallel mechanism which can be used to make up a building drum, stiffness model of it is estabLished on the analysis of the Link deformation. Based on the numerical simulation, the contribution of the bearing stiffness to the stiffness of building drum Linkage mechanism is analyzed, and the changing regularity of direction stiffness with the expanding of the building drum is revealed.

keywords.kw: tire building drum, stiffness analysis, Linkage mechanism

article_rec.title: Strain Response Frequency Function-Based Mechanical Damage Indentification by Fiber Bragg Grating Sensors

abstract.par: Local damages in mechnical structure affect machine's safety and performance, and more severely can cause irreversible structural fracture. Local damage is often hard to be identified by displacement-related parameters, but strain-related damage identification index can reflect its location and severity. Successful damage identification by strain-related index depends on distributed measurement of structural strain field, with the advantages of tiny size, Light weight, anti-electromagnetism interference and wavelength division multiplexing, fiber bragg grating (FBG) sensor is a exceptional choice for strain field measurement of mechanical structures. In this work, FBG distributed sensing is suggested to apply to strain field measurement of mechanical structure, based on strain frequency response function, a damage identification index adapted to FBG strain sensing is proposed. Numerical analysis and experimental tests proved that this method combining strain frequency response function-based index with FBG distributed sensing is sensitive to local damage, and is a simple but effective way to detect damage of mechanical structures.

keywords.kw: mechanical damage identification, strain frequency response function index, fiber bragg grating strain sensing

article_rec.title: Structural Analysis of Size of Machine Vision Measuring System Based on Structured Light and Its Experimental Study

abstract.par: To overcame the problem of low metering accuracy of on-Line automatic size measurement and the complexity of its tradition system structure. We propose a size of the machine vision measurement system based on CCD and structured Light, and study its appLication of characteristic information Extraction of part. Then, the paper presents the reLiabiLity and error analysis of the measurement system. Experiments show that the sCheme has a huge developing space and very bright developing prospects in on-Line measurement of part size.

keywords.kw: Structured Light, CCD, Machine Vision, Structure Analysis

article_rec.title: Structural Design for Lightweight Off-Axis TMA Space Telescope

abstract.par: A kind of small space telescope with 1m focal length was designed. By adopting finite element analysis technique, the structure of the space telescope was analyzed. The analysis results indicate that the surface profile accuracy of the mirrors reach to RMS 8.0nm with the working circumstances 4 °C uniform temperature change and space micro-gravity, the base frequency of the structure was 115 Hz. It shows that the designed structure has sufficiently high dynamic and static stiffness and thermal dimensional stabiLity. This space optical telescope is very suitable for Little satelLite appLication.

keywords.kw: space telescope, mirror, finite element analysis, flexible support

article_rec.title: Study of Long-Distance Real-Time Data Transmission Technology Based on Web

abstract.par: This article introduces the principle of Remote based on web, It describes in details the key technology in socket programming to reaLize Remote control software which is described in the JAVA and VC++ language environment. The key technology and method are presented in the article.

keywords.kw: WEB, JAVA, VC++, C/S

article_rec.title: Study of Online Automative Detection Based on the Vibration Signal of Dual-Processor

abstract.par: According to the harmful vibration existed in the engineering technology fields especially under the fault condition, a wide bandwidth vibration fault diagnosis system is introduced, which can obtain the acceleration, rate and displacement simultaneously. This instrument composes of dual-processor OMAP5912.By using its DSP core the instrument is able to analyze the vibration signals under operation, transfer the result to ARM core, then display the result by LCD, besides the addition of extensible fault diagnosis expert system. Through the simulation and experimental detection, to verify the vaLidity of the methods detecting the bandwidth vibration signal from 20Hz to 10KHz.

keywords.kw: OMAP5912, parallel processing, FFT, expert system

article_rec.title: Study of Singers' Physiology and Part Determination in Concerted Music

abstract.par: The partition and determination of singing voice is an essential problem in vocal music teaching and studying, also an assignable significant element in vocal music training. According to acoustics, sound science, physiology principles, the human vocal organs construction principles with the wind or stringed instruments have common features. People's "voice organ" is the physiological basis of human singing, the composition of the human voice voice from the vocal cords, larynx, pharynx, oral cavity, nasal cavity, lungs and other composed of a number of organs. Voice is the voice of the physical structure and basis for the Department to determine the key.

keywords.kw: Voice, part determination, vocal cords

article_rec.title: Study of the Prestack Elastic Parameter Inversion Based on Immune Genetic Algorithm

abstract.par: In order to efficiently invert seismic ampLitudes for elastic parameters, the Zoeppritz equations are simpLified with only four independent elastic property contrasts across the interface. A novel immune genetic algorithm (IGA) is presented for geophysical P-wave ampLitude variation with offset (AVO) inversion. The details of an IGA approach are described and implemented. The eLitism method increases the probabiLity of finding the global optimum. The mechanism of antibody suppression and the adaptive probabiLities of crossover and mutation adoption greatly improve the effectiveness of IGA. Applying the IGA to typical earth interface models for P-wave AVO inversion, four rock property contrasts are better extracted. The precision of the inverted P-wave velocity and bulk density contrast is high.

keywords.kw: Immune Algorithm, Genetic Algorithm, Elastic Parameter, AVO inversion

article_rec.title: Study on CAD for the Complex Combustion Structure in Engine Based on PRO/E

abstract.par: To carry out CAD (computer-aided design) for the complex combustion structure in engine, the top-down method is used. The general model is created in assembly and every part design is finished according to general assembly. The group of piston crankshaft connecting rod is designed and each part is modeled in Pro/E. Pro/E is a soLid modeler and this offers considerable advantage for soLid model creation. Normally, the geometry is first sketChed in 2-D and then extruded in the third direction to generate a 3-D model. Once this base geometry has been created, additional features Like holes, rounds, chamfers, fillets, ribs, etc can be added in the finishing stages of the part creation. The center of the bowl does not coincide with the center of the cyLinder due to the presence of valve pockets. The obvious advantage of this configuration is that is gives the true geometry of the piston and the presence of connecting rod means that the connecting rod ports can be accommodated when the piston is at the top dead center.

keywords.kw: CAD, the top-down method, Pro/E, rapid manufacturing

article_rec.title: Study on Condensation Control of Radiant Cooling Ceiling

abstract.par: This paper introduces the advantages and drawbacks of an air condition with radiant cooLing ceiLing comparing to the traditional air conditions. Aiming at the condensation problem of radiant cooLing ceiLing, we put forward control measures with the dedicated outdoor air systems and chilled beams. Furthermore, taking a common office as a example, we calculate the heating and moisture loads of the test room, and analyses the sensible heat load and the latent heat load in decouple method. The results show the practicabiLity of these measures theoretically. Finally, related experiment data confirms the effectiveness of the adopted control measures and shows an ideal effect.

keywords.kw: Radiant CooLing CeiLing, Condensation, Dedicated Outdoor Air System, Chilled Beam

article_rec.title: Study on Energy Consumption Status and Development Strategy of Metropolis in China
article_rec.subtitle: A Case Study of Shanghai

abstract.par: The rapid urbanization is an important driving force of rapid economic development and energy consumption growth in China. The aim of this paper is to study the mode of energy consumption and existent problem in metropoLis of China during the fast economic growth course. As an international metropoLis and the economic center of China, Shanghai is taken as a case to be studied in this paper. Characteristics of economic growth, social progress and energy consumption in Shanghai are studied, the existent problems are analyzed based on the contrast with other countries or regions. Finally the urban energy development strategies harmonious with economy and environment are discussed.

keywords.kw: Energy, Economic growth, MetropoLis, Development Strategy

article_rec.title: Study on Environment Impact Assessment of Land Development and Consolidation Planning

abstract.par: The objectives of this paper were to estabLish a comprehensive appraise system of China's environmental impact assessment of land development and consoLidation planning through a case study of Nantong city in Jiangsu province. Methods employed include empirical analysis, documentation, and weighting method. The results indicate that, (1) the index system including social, economic and ecological index can be estabLishes and the weighting method can be used in planning environmental impact assessment, (2) the implementation of land development and consoLidation planning improved the integrated environment in Nantong County, and (3) the preventive and mitigation measurements could be proposed for strict control of occupying, idLing and destructing the basic farmland, and improving the management. It is concluded that, the appraise system basing on the weighting method is simple and feasible for improving and developing the environmental impact assessment of land development and consoLidation planning.

keywords.kw: Land development, consoLidation planning, Environment impact assessment, Nantong city

article_rec.title: Study on Identification Method of Tool Wear Based on Singular Spectrum Analysis and Support Vector Machine

abstract.par: Acoustic Emission signal reflecting the tool wear state is made by phase space reconstruction that uses mutual information method and Cao method to determine time delay and embedding dimension for constructing phase space matrix. After reconstruction, by calculating singular spectral of phase space matrix, based on which characteristic vector is constructed. These characteristic vectors are combined with the Support Vector Machine for training, which supports Support Vector Machine classifier model to predict new data. Compared with classifier model gotten by AE signal being directly put into Support Vector Machine after phase space reconstruction, the AE signals based on KC9125 tool cutting 40CrNiMoA can increase forecasting accuracy from 90% to raise 98%.

keywords.kw: Tool wear, Singular spectrum analysis, Phase space reconstruction, Support vector machine

article_rec.title: Study on Realization of Dynamic Interaction with CAD Complex Model in Virtual Reality System

abstract.par: Virtual reaLity technology is one of new technologies involving multitudinous knowledge. Based on the virtual reaLity, the construction of complex three dimension (3D) CAD model and the way of reading are introduced. Taken VIRTOOLS as the platform, the processing of complex model and the dynamic interaction of the whole model with virtual environment are elaborated. With the example, the reaLization of the interactive platform and data reading are introduced in 3DMAX model, and given the translation & rotating interactive module by the VIRTOOLS software. It will provide a foundation for the development of virtual reaLity system.

keywords.kw: Virtual reaLity, Dynamic interaction, VIRTOOLS, Model structure

article_rec.title: Study on the Improved A2/O Process Used in Swine Wastewater Treatment

abstract.par: An experiment of treating anaerobic fermented hog pen sewage by improved A2/O reactor was carried out to study the pollution mater reducing rate during the course of combine domestication. After anaerobic fermented cultivation course of hog pen sewage by A2/O technics, tHought the treatment system's parameters included deLiquescent oxygen (DO), hydrauLics reside time (HRT) to study the system's treatment effect. The experiment results indicated the A2/O reactor can successfully run with the firstly independent and secondly united start mode after sixty days. Treated by A2/O reactor the water's COD and NH3-N removal rate could reach 90% and 95% while the PO4 3-was 83%. SS and turbidity both had reduced approximately 90% in the effluent.

keywords.kw: Swine wastewater, improved A2/O Process, anaerobic fermentation

article_rec.title: Study on the Laser Micro-manufacturing Equipment of Special Micro-manufacturing Technology

abstract.par: Laser micro-manufacturing on the inner surface of engine cyLinder, the laser micro-manufacturing equipment of the special micro-manufacturing technology was developed. Considering the work piece is heavy and large volume and the shape of the work piece is irregular, the manufacture method that fixing the work piece and the laser head does rotational motion and up and down Linear motion was adopted. This system structure not only satisfies the simultaneous output of the laser pulse and the auxiLiary gas, but also guarantees the air tightness of the system and the rotation coaxiaLity of the laser head. With the CNC system's coordinated control on the mechanical movement and the output of single laser pulse, the laser micro-manufacturing technology of "single pulse one time, repeating at intervals" is successfully reaLized. With this technology, laser micro-manufacturing on the inner surface of engine cyLinder is efficient and high quaLity.

keywords.kw: Laser Micro-manufacturing, CNC System, Coordinated Control, Equipment

article_rec.title: Study on the Processing Methods of Aluminum Foil Measurement Signals for Ultrasonic Cleaning Parameters

abstract.par: The signals of aluminum foil measurement results for Ultrasonic Cleaning device Parameters need accurate test and estimate by effectively signal processing methods. The characteristics of aluminum foil measurement methods are analyzed. An area assessment method and corrosion degree of the aluminum foil is put forward. The evaluation program was given and the appLication of aluminum foil measure methods was studied. It is demonstrated by the experimental study that this measurement method by aluminum foil can reaLize the study on the time characteristics of the ultrasonic cleaning machine, selection of the frequency mode of action and study on the temperature characteristics, which provided an effective data support and experimental verification for the performance parameters design of the ultrasonic cleaning machine.

keywords.kw: Ultrasonic, Cleaning, Aluminum foil, Test, Corrosion, Evaluation

article_rec.title: Study on the Stress Distribution of Grinding Wheel Based on ANSYS under Multi-operating Modes

abstract.par: This paper estabLishes a finite element model of grinding wheel and the stress analysis is carried out under idLing, normal, and abnormal conditions separately. On idLing condition, the tangential stress is the main failure factors of grinding wheel by the effects of centrifugal force. The stress distribution of grinding wheel on normal conditon is consistent with the abnomal condition's. When working in the same conditons, the equivalent stress of grinding wheel with side force are far greater than that of grinding wheel witHout side force, and more vulnerable to grinding safety accident. The conclusion in this paper provide a strong basis for the further study of failure mechanism and the structure design optimization of grinding wheel.

keywords.kw: grinding wheel, stress distribution, finite element method, side force, ANSYS

article_rec.title: Sub-optimal Linear Beamforming Design on MIMO Two-Way Relay Channels

abstract.par: A sub-optimal cooperative beam forming design method of the ampLify-and-forward (AF) MIMO two-way relay channels is proposed in this work based on the optimal beam forming design which minimize the sum mean square errors (MSMSE). Suppose the channel state information (CSI) is perfectly known by the receiver and transmitter as well as the relay, global optimal beam forming can be achieved. By analyzing the MSMSE-based optimal method, the results show that effect of the transmit and receive beam forming pairs is to maximize the receive SNR at two communication nodes, and rank of the optimal relay beam forming matrix is no larger than 2 when there is only one data stream at both communication nodes. Based on the analysis, a simpLified algorithm is proposed to design the beam forming vectors (matrices). Simulation results show that the system performance of bit error rates (BER) of the simpLified method is very close to the optimal one with fast iteration speed and much lower computational complexity.

keywords.kw: Beamforming, Two-Way Relay, MIMO

article_rec.title: Synthesis of Combined Geneva Mechanism with Cycloid Crank

abstract.par: When the slot number of the geneva is fixed, the kinematic coefficient of common geneva mechanism is a fixed value, too. Using the cycloid production mechanism as the drive crank of geneva is equal to the mechanism with a variable length, variable velocity and along the cycloid moving crank, which makes the kinematic coefficient of the geneva mechanism changed. A synthesis method of combined geneva mechanism is put forward according to the kinematic coefficients in this paper. The calculation method of the maximum and minimum kinematic coefficient and the geneva mechanism parameters are also proposed. The parameters of the combined geneva mechanism are presented, which the middle position of the kinematic range of the geneva has instantaneous dwell or approximate constant velocity characteristics.

keywords.kw: Geneva mechanism, mechanism synthesis, cycloid crank, kinematic coefficient

article_rec.title: The Application and Research of a Simulation-Based Line Balancing Method

abstract.par: Aiming at the production Line of gearbox, this paper appLies a Line balancing method and the object oriented modeLing technology. Firstly, the simulation model of the box streamLine is set up and, the bottleneck is found out and analyzed with the model. Secondly, the rebuilt strategy based on the principles of ECRS(ELiminate, Combine, Rearrange, Simple) and the theory of production Line balancing is given and evaluated by the model. Finally, comparing with the former production Line, implementation of the new strategy makes the production efficiency and quaLity improved greatly.

keywords.kw: Line balancing, simulation, capacity, bottleneck

article_rec.title: The Application of BP Neural Network in the Fault Diagnosis of Rotating Machinery

abstract.par: BP neural network is effective for deaLing with non-Linear mapping which could satisfactorily describe the non-Linear relations between frequency character and diagnosis results. So the de-noising and feature extraction methods of rotating machinery is discussed in this paper, and a diagnosis model for rotating machinery based on BP neural network is proposed and set up. Then, emulates the model of diagnosis of BP neural network through using MATLAB. Experiment results show that the proposed method based on BP neural network has high practical value in the rotating machinery fault diagnosis.

keywords.kw: Fault Diagnosis, Neural Network, Wavelet Packet, Rotating Machinery

article_rec.title: The Application of Cloud Computing SaaS Delivery Model in University Talents Training

abstract.par: SaaS (Software as a Service) and cloud computing are two emerging concepts. This article will combine them together and conduct a comprehensive research, SaaS can solve problems such as insufficient hardware and bandwidth by using cloud computing. In the mean time, cloud computing can make its own powerful integrated resources perform more adequately through the SaaS model, thus all structure the cloud computing SaaS deLivery model for talents training at university.

keywords.kw: SaaS, cloud computing, university, talents training

article_rec.title: The Application of Fuzzy System Group in Intelligent Diagnosis for Power Tranformer

abstract.par: For a long time, the fault diagnosis and assessment for power transformer is a quite complex and difficult problem. In this paper, we propose a transformer fault diagnosis method based on fuzzy theory. The dissolved gas concentrations are set as the inputs of the system, and a fuzzy system group is appLied to build the intelLigent diagnosis system. The parameters of the system, including the input dimension, output dimension, and the membership functions, can be set up in whole or separately in the system. To test the effectiveness of the proposed method, it is appLied to the practice dataset. The experiment results show that the fuzzy system group improves the accuracy of assessment greatly compared with fuzzy system and BP neural networks. Also, the knowledge system of power transformer fault diagnosis can be built up completely by the proposed method.

keywords.kw: Fuzzy system, Fuzzy system group, Dissolved Gas Analysis

article_rec.title: The Application of Informatization in the Fast and Accurate Cost Accounting Process of Machinery Manufacturing Industry

abstract.par: This papers, directing at machinery manufacturing enterprises implementing order production and the problems existing in their fast and accurate cost accounting process relying on informatization, from the perspectives of cost accounting process and the integration of PDM and ERP, aims to propose an effective method which will bring about fast and accurate cost accounting. Additionally, this paper also points out the influence of fast and accurate cost accounting on enterprises' implementing of cost planning and reaLizing of target cost.

keywords.kw: order production, parallel flow, ERP, PDM

article_rec.title: The Application of PLC to CNC Machine Tools Development

abstract.par: Introduce a CNC system for nonstandard machine tool based on PLC and programmable multi-axis controller, which is appLied to CNC machine. Comparing with traditional CNC system, the proposed design has not only simpLified machine tool structure and control system, but also make user's program simpLification. The control functions of PLC are introduced and the PLC ladder diagram is given out.

keywords.kw: PLC, CNC, machine tool, ladder diagram

article_rec.title: The Bio-remediation Technology of Organophosphorus Pesticides Contaminated Soil

abstract.par: In order to increase the degradation efficiency of chlorpyrifos pesticides in soil, a organ phosphorous degrading condition was optimized for a compound microbial agent which composed of a high-performance microbial and unninghamella. Orthogonal design table was used to select soil moisture, pH, chlorpyrifos concentration and compound microbial agents inoculation amount as reference factors in potted plants. The results of the orthogonal design analysis indicated that optimal chlorpyrifos degradation condition for this compound agent was soil moisture 40%, pH 7.3, chlorpyrifos concentration and microbial agent inoculation amount 100 µg"mg-1 and 200ml"kg-1.Temperture target analysis demonstrated that this compound agent had a broader temperature tolerance, it could carry out the degradation of chlorpyrifos at temperature 20-35°C, which 30°C was the most suitable temperature for the agents. Analysis of extreme differences indicated that soil pH had the maximum influence on the chlorpyrifos in the soil. Other factors affecting the chlorpyrifos degeneration followed as soil moist > inoculation amount > chlorpyrifos concentration.

keywords.kw: chlorpyrifos, compound microbial agent, potted plants, Orthogonal)

article_rec.title: The Break Failure Analysis of the 65Mn Chain Mat

abstract.par: The author used the electronic optical instrument to carry on macroscopic, the microscopic observation and the metallographic examination to the 65Mn break chain mat fracture, has given the primary cause which the chain mat break failure, and explained the mechanism which in the chain mat the hole surface microcrack formed, to improve the chain mat quaLity to provide the rationale.

keywords.kw: chain mat, microcrackle, inspection, failure analysis

article_rec.title: The Calibration Algorithm of Energy Detection and Site Meter

abstract.par: This chapter proposes a kind of caLibration algorithm to capture the number of pulses which aims to the caLibration of the meter field so as to achieve the accurate detection of power. In order to avoid the leakage of spectrum, it samples three-phase AC synchronously with the technology of digital phase-locked frequency multipLication. It describes the method of power correction in detail and decrease the power measurement error caused by additional phase. Results illustrate that the proposed algorithm is correct and effect.

keywords.kw: field caLibration algorithm, digital phase-locked frequency, synchronous sampLing, power adjustment

article_rec.title: The CMM Measurement Path Planning for Blade Surface Based on the Contour Measurement

abstract.par: In order to calculate blade sectional parameters and errors, the blades are often measured with the contour measurement. According to the requirements of the contour measurement that measuring points of airfoil section must be on the plane of constant height, an approach for the measurement path planning is proposed. Firstly, the blade surface model was reconstructed based on CMM measurement data, then measurement path planning for airfoil section was done through it. The principle and process of path planning is given. The calculation formulas of the measuring points of blade sectional Line are summarized, and the distribution density of measuring points is determined with curvature. Blade sectional Line based on measuring points and equidistant surface are researChed.

keywords.kw: blade section, the contour measurement, coordinate measuring machines (CMM), Path planning, NURBS curve

article_rec.title: The Construction Control Craft of Guardrail Panel of Precast Concrete

abstract.par: The concrete crash barrier is the exposed engineering which only visible, influence handsome appearance at during driving after bridge structure complete, the project quaLity and the geometry size accurate or not immediate influence project overall image, therefore the quaLity requirement standard is high. And because the shape characteristic of the crash barrier determine construction technology isnot easy to master and the appearance of concrete barrier exist defect, especially more bubble, appearance Line which not straight are not esay to overcome.

keywords.kw: concrete, crash barrier, prefabricated fence panel

article_rec.title: The Cooling Principle of High Temperature Exchange Machinery System with Plenty of Cold Source

abstract.par: After entering the deep mining, the temperature of the original rock seriously affects the mine safety production. Therefore, it is urgent to reduce the working face temperature. According to the problem of mine cooLing technologies in China and abroad and actual condition of coal mines, High Temperature Exchange Machinery System (HEMS) with mine water inrush as cold energy was developed. Combined with the characteristics of ZhangsHuanglou coal mine, the ZhangsHuanglou model of cooLing systen with plenty of cold source was proposed-the circulation utiLization principle of mine water inrush between ground and underground. As for one of key equipment cold and heat energy exchange system (HEMS-II), the operational principle from theory and actual appLication is given. Through the comparison of cooLing technology at China and abroad, HEMS opens a new technology to solve the deep mine heat hazard, which makes good sense in energy conservation and pollution reduction.

keywords.kw: cold, heat energy exchange system, mine water inrush, plenty of cold source, deep mine cooLing

article_rec.title: The Data Processing System of CNC Wood-Working Milling Machine

abstract.par: In order to mill irregular curves by CNC wood-working machine based polar coordinates, a new method was presented. This new method takes the technology of graphics interaction with DXF file, and can mill directly according to the work piece contour curves data. CNC carpentry Line trace mill data processing software was developed which can reaLize arbitrary contour curves discretization and G-Code generation. The processing experiments prove that this system can simpLify the machine operation, increase milLing efficiency, improve quaLity effectively and reduce the production cost.

keywords.kw: CNC, wood-working milLing machine, DXF file, contour curves, irregular curves, discretization

article_rec.title: The Design and Calculation of Tension-Length Integrated Sensor of Winch Cable

abstract.par: An integrated sensor which combined tension measurement with length measurement of winch cable was designed. The length was measured by specific measurement wheel and photoelectric encoder, both of which maintained rolLing state with winch cable, while tension can be measured in an indirect way with the shear strain, after designing measurement wheel axle to be axle pin type weighing-sensor. Practice proved that the sensor has such strongpoint as topping measure precision, lower bit error rate, high performance-price rate. This paper introduced the integrated sensor's work principle, the method of design and calculation for sensor elastomer, besides these, it also put forward some problems which sHould be noted in the process of designing and applying on the basis of analyzing origins of different kinds of measure error.

keywords.kw: winch cable, the measure of tension, length, integrated sensor, design

article_rec.title: The Design and Realization of the Fault Diagnosis Expert System of CNC

abstract.par: Taking Visual Basic 6.0 as the development tool, design the fault diagnosis expert system of CNC machine, which is a kind of knowledge-based intelLigent computer appLications program, it is made up of the knowledge base, reasoning machine, dynamic facts Library, explain mechanism,knowledge acquisition mechanism and user interfaces etc.

keywords.kw: CNC, fault diagnosis, Visual Basic 6.0, expert system

article_rec.title: The Design of Dissolved Oxygen Detection System Based on C8051F020

abstract.par: A design of detection system about dissolved oxygen is proposed based on C8051F020 which is an integrated mixed-signal system-on-chip MCU. It can quickly and accurately detect Dissolved Oxygen (DO) in the water. The software adopts Multi-sensor data fusion and temperature compensation to eLiminate the effects of temperature and the sensor itself, enhance the measurement precision. And serial communication of RS232 is used in this system which can sent data to upper PC. The system is of high practicabiLity.

keywords.kw: dissolved oxygen, C8051F020, temperature compensation, multi-sensor data fusion

article_rec.title: The Design of Embedded IPV4 \ IPV6 Protocol Converter Based on ARM9

abstract.par: With the rapid growth of Internet-scale, IPv4 address space will run out this year. Therefore, the construction of IPv6 network will accelerate. The length of IP addresses bits from 32 bits to 128 bits in the IPv6 Protocol, so it has a vast address space. Since the transitional period from IPv4 to IPv6 requires a fairly long process, during this period, we must ensure that Pv4 and IPv6 can exchange date. In this paper, we use the AT90RM9200 processor design a flexible, low-cost IPv4\IPv6 protocol converter, which support the SIP protocol, IPv4 and IPv6 networks can communicate with each other, furthermore, the IPv4 network data can be achieved through the IPv6 network.

keywords.kw: Siphonic NAT-PT, IPV4\IPV6, Protocol Converter, SIP protocol, multi-threaded

article_rec.title: The Design of Master Control System Based on SIP Protocol

abstract.par: This article analyzed the structure of open source oSIP protocol stack, implemented a intelLigent control system based on ARM - Linux platform. SIP server using Windows development environment, mainly complete real-time display of home temperature and video information. The system of SIP terminal adopted embedded ARM-Linux as system platform, completed temperature data and video information collection and network transmission. Data transmission based on SIP protocol.

keywords.kw: Siphoni SIP protocol, ARM, Embedded platform, Multithreading

article_rec.title: The Discussion of Spur Gear Library System Based on UG/Open

abstract.par: UGNX second development technology is used to create the cyLindrical spur gear 3d parametric model. then menu and interface designed by UG/Open API, MenuScript menu and UIStyler dialog and control procedures, thus build intuitive gear database man-machine interface. In UG environment, the system will automatically generate fully comply with the design requirements of users gear models, when the gear design parameters and structure parameters inputted to dialog by user.

keywords.kw: UG/Open, UG Customizing Development, spur gear

article_rec.title: The Effect and Development Strategies of Digital Agriculture during New Countryside Construction

abstract.par: The researChes in the thesis are mainly focused on the concept and features of digital agriculture. People make a analysis on the relationship between digital agriculture and new countryside construction, pointing out the main problems in the process of digital agriculture development and the countermeasures for them.

keywords.kw: digital agriculture, new countryside construction, strategies

article_rec.title: The Effect of Biomass Components on the Co-combustion Characteristics of Biomass with Coal

abstract.par: The effect of cellulose, xylan and Lignin contents on the co-combustion characteristic of biomass and coal was investigated by thermo gravimetric analyzer (TGA). In addition, the difference of combustion characteristic among cellulose, xylan and Lignin was studied. Cellulose had the highest onset temperature of combustion among cellulose, xylan and Lignin. The weight loss region was focused in a rather narrow temperature range. Xylan combusted easily compared with cellulose and the weight loss mainly occurred from 193.61 to 320°C. The weight loss of Lignin was very slow and covered over a broad temperature range from 152.16 to 700°C with the soLid residue left of 9% which was the highest among the three biomass components. The cellulose, xylan and Lignin contents were important factors that affected the co-combustion characteristic of biomass and coal. Increasing the cellulose, xylan and Lignin contents respectively can raise the devolatiLization rate, reduce the ignition temperature, and promote the combustion of char correspondingly.

article_rec.title: The Effect of Processing Parameters on Performance of Laser Welding Tailored Blanks of Different Thickness

abstract.par: There are some deficiencies such as inconsistency, oversize waist, and sharp corner in the cross-section of the welding seam. Orthogonal test is conducted under different speed, defocus, and offset. The metalLic phase of the seam is observed by using electronic microscope. By analyzing the results of Erichsen test and tensile test, the effect of processing parameters on the performance of the seam is studied. The results show that deep punching performance will be improved and the waist will be reduced when the welding speed is increased. If the defocus is a quarter of the thick blank thickness and the offset value is 0.1mm, the surface of the welding seam will be smooth.

keywords.kw: laser welding, inconsistency, welding speed, waist, sharp corner, defocus, offset

article_rec.title: The Electrical Parameters Design of EAF Voltage Fluctuation Suppression

abstract.par: In order to solve the problem of voltage fluctuations caused by reactive power consumption and fluctuation range of reactive current in ultra-high power electric arc furnace, the high impedance is used in ultra-high power electric arc furnace system, and it gives the relationship between the arc electrical parameters (series reactance, the transformer voltage, power factor, arc resistance, etc.) under the conditions of constant arc power, also, the mathematical model of change rate of the reactive power fluctuation is estabLished. Here, the 40t electric arc furnace is given as an example to verify the results. The results show that the high impedance can reduce the energy consumption and the capacity of reactive compensation devices, improve the arc stabiLity and reduce the voltage fLicker.

keywords.kw: Ultra-High Power Electric Arc Furnace, High Impedance, Voltage Fluctuation, Reactive Power

article_rec.title: The Imbalance Source of Spindle-Tool System and Influence to Machine Vibration Characteristics

abstract.par: Because of various errors in the process of special structural designing, manufacturing and assembLing, there are varying degrees of unbalanced residual content in machine spindle-tool system. This research presents some kinds of imbalance source of spindle-tool system, on the basis of classification, and then its component's dynamic balancing quaLity grade influenced on the balanced state of entire system was demonstrated. By means of machine raising-speed idle running in CNC machine, three cases of testing machine vibration signal and analyzing its characteristics were investigated in turns, including spindle witHout assembLing tool system, the spindle with assembLing perfect balanced tool system and the spindle with various imbalance of tool system. The comparing results and conclusions will provide effective guideLine on the researching about spindle-tool system's imbalance influence to high speed machining stabiLity and processing quaLity.

keywords.kw: Spindle-too system, Balancing quaLity grade, Adjustable Balancing Ring, Machine Raising-Speed Idle Running, Vibration Characteristics

article_rec.title: The Iterative Learning Control System for 600MW Unit Milling System

abstract.par: The ball mill pulverizing system with multi-variable, strong coupLing, large inertia and time-varying etc characteristics, long-term since difficult to input automatic control, therefore become electric power industry automatic control research hot spot problems. This paper studied and analyzed in detail the working principle of the ball mill pulverizing system and work characteristics, using multiple model objects description its dynamic characteristics, based on iterative learning control, controller design and simulation for the ball mill system. The results show that the ball mill system variabiLity, coupLing and delayed nature can be well solved by the iterative learning control, achieved good control effect.

keywords.kw: System powder system, Iterative learning control, Multivariable systems, Mathematical model

article_rec.title: The Kinematic Analysis and Parametric Design of Beam Pumping Unit Based on ADAMS

abstract.par: This paper used the ADAMS mechanical systems dynamic simulation to estabLish the virtual prototype model of CYJY12-4.2-73-type beam-pumping unit. Through some parameters calculation and movement analysis, we obtained the rules of suspension point displacement, velocity and acceleration. From the movement rules of suspension point, we saw some weak points. We carried out parametric design and analysis for several parameters of the pumping units using the Design Study of ADAMS, which was amid at the crank shaft torque of the reducer. Our work can be a reference to the designer.

keywords.kw: ADAMS, beam pumping unit, Design Study, parametric analysis, torque

article_rec.title: The MultiAgent Stress Analysis and Design of Rectangular Tube Forming

abstract.par: Analyses the characteristics of fitness equipment with rectangular tubes, which use the first round and the rear square and skew rolLing forming process according to its different ratio of long and wide, given the sChematic diagram of forming process and the basic calculation method of caLiber design, using the multiAgent technology analyzing the stress situation of skew rolLing process of the rectangular tubes, then estabLishing corresponding Agent stressing model. In determining the basis of forming passes, determine the deformation amount and corner quantity per passes, and reaLized the forming process of virtual in computer.

keywords.kw: Rectangular Tube, Roller, CaLiber, Agent

article_rec.title: The Node Localization Research of the Underground Wireless Sensor Networks Based on DV-Hop and Ant Colony Optimization

abstract.par: In order to hold the hardware cost is not the premise of improving the positioning accuracy of sensor nodes, the paper proposed the node locaLization research of the underground wireless sensor networks based on DV-Hop and Ant Colony Optimization, this method of non-ranging DV-Hop algorithm calculate the distance between unknown nodes and beacon nodes, with the method of triangular positioning algorithm to determine the location of unknown nodes, and through the ant colony optimization to improve accuracy of the unknown node location. To verify the feasibiLity of the method, with the comparison of the traditional orientation algorithms and the improved algorithm by MATLAB simulation, experimental results show that the improved algorithm has higher accuracy.

keywords.kw: ant Colony Optimization, DV-Hop, positioning algorithm

article_rec.title: The Performance Study about the Boronitriding Layer in the Low Temperature

abstract.par: The experimental results showed that the layer is composed of boride zones and transition zones. Boride zones are dense and there are not porosities and micro-crack. The boride zones of carbon steel appear tine-comb by low-temperature boronitriding and consist FeB+Fe2B. The boride zones of alloyed steel appear flat, and their phase constitution are compLicated. The phase constitution of the surface of Cr12 steel by low-temperature boronitriding are Fe2B, FeB and Fe4N. The phase constitution of sub-surface are FeB, Fe2B, Fe3(C,B), (Fe,Cr)2B, Fe4N and Fe3C. There are Fe3(C,B), Fe4N, etal in transition zone, and this get strengthening and tightly adhere to boride. It indicates that the morphology and brittleness of boride are improved and the depth of boronizing layer is deeper by adding RE. The results of micro-hardness test showed that surface hardness has a highest value in the boride, it is 1780HV. The micro-hardness profile low-temperature boronitriding layer of carbon steel from surface to core is more smoothing. The micro-hardness profile low-temperature boronitriding layer of alloyed steel is steep. There is not softened zone in transition zone compared with high-temperature boronitriding, which benefit to binding of the layer and matrix.

keywords.kw: low-temperature boronizing, optimization design, Optimization design, wear resistanc

article_rec.title: The Research and Realization of Algorithms for Guillotine Rectangle Cutting Stock Problem

abstract.par: The two-dimensional material cutting optimization is a kind of problem which usually appears in Life. In order to save materials, the appropriate cutting plan must be selected to make consumed the least materials. In accordance with the cutting sCheme, the rectangle cutting stock problem can be divided into two categories, guillotine and non-guillotine. The problem having guillotine constraint is studied and analyzed in the paper. First, the model for two-dimensional cutting stock problem is analyzed with the knapsack column algorithm for the one-dimensional cutting stock problem. Then, based on the analysis of the guillotine rectangle cutting stock problem and the comparison with one-dimensional cutting stock problem, a rectangle knapsack column generation algorithm is proposed. Finally, through testing instances, it is proved that this algorithm is a useful way to improve utiLization ratio of plate material.

keywords.kw: Two-dimensional Cutting Stock Problem, Column Generation, Rectangle Knapsack Algorithm

article_rec.title: The Research on Cable Broken Wires Inspection for a Cable Stayed Bridge by Discrete Wavelet Transformation

abstract.par: An inspection method and cirCuit by magnetic leakage field is offered for cables, due for which the test of a serving cable stayed bridge must be only lossless. In order to reduce noise of space magnetic field during the work environment that of result in an unclear signal character, a discrete soft threshold algorithm on the Gaussian white noise is appLied to separate signal and noise for circumference magnetic field of a Checked cable by the dyadic wavelet transform for the sake of the fault size. In order to obtain the precise fault location, a singularity analysis is appLied for oriental magnetic field of the cable by the singular point of signal waveform and Lipschitz exponent. The experiment results have showed that it will be obtained the information of fault degree and location to the Checked cable by the new approach, so that the credible proof will be given about detection and analysis to the broken wires for the cable stayed bridge.

keywords.kw: magnetic leakage field inspection, discrete wavelet transformation, cable stayed bridge, separation from signal, noise, singular point

article_rec.title: The Research on Detection Method of Battery Discharge

abstract.par: At present, there is low accuracy and single discharge mode existing in battery discharge systems. During detection procedure of battery discharge the parasitic resistance is the key factor that affects the measurement accuracy, thus one of the important measures to improve the detection accuracy of the battery discharge is to eLiminate the influence of parasitic resistance. To solve the above problems, this paper introduces a battery discharge detection technique based on numerical control constant-current source and four-terminal measurement. The research shows that the detection approach not only effectively eLiminates the influence of parasitic resistance to measurement accuracy, but also achieves the unity of various discharge methods, which can better meet the dual requirements of manufacturers, including both the detection accuracy of battery discharge and multiple discharge methods.

keywords.kw: battery discharge, numerical control constant-current source, four-terminal measurement, discharge method, parasitic resistance

article_rec.title: The Simulation Analysis of Magnetic Circuit of Contactless Power Transfer System Based on ANSYS

abstract.par: This paper analyses components of the contactless power transfer (CPT) system and the operating principle. It presents and reaLizes utiLizing ANSYS finite element software to make the two-dimensional and three-dimensional simulations of the loosely coupled transformer. The loosely couple transformer is the key part of the CPT system. Through drawing and analyzing the distributions of magnetic field intensity and magnetic flux density of loosely coupled transformer, the key technical parameters of loosely coupled transformer are calculated, such as flux Linkage and inductance. Through comparing the analysis results of EE42 and EC42 core, the assisting design method of the core structure of the transformer is presented.

keywords.kw: CPT, Loosely coupled transformer, Finite element analysis, ANSYS

article_rec.title: The Static and Dynamic Analysis of High-speed Electric Spindle Based on ANSYS

abstract.par: In order to investigate the performance of the high-speed electric spindle, the static and dynamic characteristics of the spindle are analyzed by using the finite element analysis method in this paper. For obtaining the static deformation and static stiffness of the spindle, static analysis of the spindle is carried out based on a simpLified static analysis model through using the software of ANSYS. The natural frequencies and mode shapes of the electric spindle have also been obtained by using modal analysis method based on ANSYS. Furthermore, the influences of the spindle span on the natural frequencies of the electric spindle are studied in this paper. The results are shown that he finite element analysis method based on ANSYS is vaLid for the static and dynamic analysis.

keywords.kw: High-speed electric spindle, Finite element analysis, Static analysis, Modal analysis

article_rec.title: The Study of Boiler Control System of Water Level of Steam Drum Based on New Immune PID Controller

abstract.par: Considering of there is a static error when the conventional PID controller is appLied to adjust the outputs suitably based on the error rate, according to biological immune adjustment principle and combined with conventional PID, a control system in boiler water level of steam drum is designed in this paper. It can reduce effectively the fluctuation range of the water level and water supply flow and it has fast response, small overshoots characteristics.

keywords.kw: Immune PID controller, Boiler, Drum water level

article_rec.title: The Study of Power Engineering Project Risk Management

abstract.par: With the special characteristics of power engineering project in construction process, there are many uncertainty risk factors. This paper estabLished a comprehensive risk evaluation index system through analyzing its characteristics and industry environment, and at the same time mathematical model was adopted. First of all, column and inverse method was used to calculate the weight of each index, and then fuzzy evaluation method was used for the risk degree evaluation. QuaLitative and quantitative analysis were combined to calculate the risk degree of power engineering project, and obtained the risk degree was medium. Example calculation shows that the method can well evaluate the risk of power engineering project management and it provides theoretical basis for power grid enterprises to strengthen the work of risk management.

keywords.kw: power engineering project, risk evaluation, fuzzy evaluation

article_rec.title: The Time-Domain Discrete Signal Processing of Cam Phase

abstract.par: Introduce a new method to determine the cam phase. Primarily describe treating with Time-domain discrete signal which is taken etc spacing sample of the theory outLine curve and the measuring outLine curve of cam, and determining phase. Describe the method of processing and the data analysis in detail.

keywords.kw: am phase, etc spacing sample, Time-domain discrete signal, theory outLine curve, measuring outLine curve

article_rec.title: The Traffic Accident Prediction Based on Neural Network

abstract.par: The traffic accident prediction play an important role in the integrated planning and management of traffic, the reason which with much randomness about the traffic accident include some nonLinear elements, such as people, car, road, cLimate and so on. The traditional way of Linear analyses can not reveal the really situation since the noise pollution and amount of data are too Little, cause the result of prediction can not satisfactory. Because of the traditional BP network have some defects, such as local minimum, too many iterations, training too slow and so on, so choose improved LM-BP network to predict. Proposed a new way about the traffic accident prediction -- improved BP neural network, the traffic accident prediction have been analysis by the network.

keywords.kw: traffic accident, BP Neural Network, time sequence

article_rec.title: Theory, Tools and Implications of Multifunctional Agriculture for Chongqing Municipality, Southwest China

abstract.par: Multifunctional agriculture (MFA) has become a widely appLied term. This paper presents an overview of background, theory and tools of MFA. In theory MFA require a special framework in institutional analysis. The IAD and SES framework can make significant contributions in this analysis. Modern techniques, such as remote sensing and GIS, are among the most powerful tools for modeLing, analyzing and promoting MFA. For its unique geographic, social and poLitical place in China, CHongqing municipaLity agriculture will have to undergo a paradigm shift from being a pure production branch fulfilLing the food security task by all means to a diversified sector providing different products and services. In the municipaLity context that means identifying the different functions of agriculture-the well-known and the hidden-to make them expLicit for the pubLic and therewith to give them new significance. Based on a quaLitative analysis of the actual situation, three impLications of MFA is special important to CHongqing municipaLity. They are building knowledge and trust, promoting good land governance and democratization of land management. This is very much a work-in-progress, and much work need to be done in the future.

keywords.kw: Multifunctional Agriculture, theory, tools, IAD framework, CHongqing MunicipaLity

article_rec.title: Three-Phase Z-Source Grid-Connected Wind Power Generation System Based on Novel Deadbeat Control

abstract.par: This paper presents a grid-connected control strategy that appLies to wind generation system on the basis of Z-source inverter. It systematically explains the operating principles and the mathematical model of the system architecture, adopting a novel voltage space vector modulation method with shoot-through zero vectors and analyzing its performance characteristics. A method is developed for generation shoot-through zero vectors. Meanwhile, a new deadbeat control algorithm is proposed in the d-q coordinate system. Considering dc controlled variables, forecasting process can be omitted in the manner when the system approaChes steady state, which also improves the dynamic characteristics of the system. In addition, closed loop control means based on Z-source capacitor voltage is introduced, which ensures that capacitor voltages stabiLize at a proper level and makes the system achieve the stabiLization of output voltages. With duty cycle and modulation ration being viewed as the inputs of space vector pulse width modulation (SVPWM) module, the method is designed to achieve maximum power point tracking (MPPT) control and grid-connected control, rendering that the system is capable of tracking the maximum power point of wind generator set and fulfill grid-connected function. Finally, related simulation suggests grid-connected current has fine sinusoidal output, high power factor, both of which demonstrate the method is accurate and efficient, with good dynamic and static characteristics.

keywords.kw: Z-source inverter, MPPT control, three-phase voltage vector, wind power generation, deadbeat control in the d-q coordinate system

article_rec.title: Tool Management System for CNC Workshop Based on LAN

abstract.par: In order to change the status of CNC tool management in workshop, improve the efficiency of tool management, and reduce the negative influence of tool management for processing efficiency, a tool management system based on LAN is designed. VC++6.0 is used for system design language, and SQL server2000 is used for the background database. The module of system function is researChed, including power settings, tool information input management, borrowing and returning of the tool, tool inventory warning, borrowing records query and database backup. In addition, the physical structure and information flow of the system is given. And the various features of the system and background database management are described.

keywords.kw: LAN, Tool, Management System, Database

article_rec.title: Tool Wear Investigation Using SEM 3D Reconstruction Technique

abstract.par: The 3D reconstruction of scanning electron microscope (SEM) combining digital speckle correlation method (DSCM) and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS) were introduced to investigate the wear of cutting tool. The tool wear morphological analysis for flank wear and crater wear were carried out based on the SEM 3D reconstruction. The wear loss depth was detected by comparing the wear surface to its reference surface which was obtained by using least square method. An indentation with known 3D construction was used to vaLidate the calculating results, and the results were well consistent with the principle of constant volume. It is concluded that the SEM 3D reconstruction combining DSCM is reLiable on wear observation and presents great advantages in real engineering appLications.

keywords.kw: wear loss depth, SEM, 3D reconstruction, digital speckle correlation

article_rec.title: Tooth Contact Analysis of Spur Face Gear Drives with Alignment Errors

abstract.par: The tooth surface equations of face gear were derived by coordinate transformation based on the principles of gear meshing and face gear manufacturing process. The face gear drives point contact model was constructed under the circumstances of various individual aLignment errors and coupLing aLignment errors, through numerical analysis and computer simulation, the influence of various errors of aLignment on transmission errors and the shift of bearing contact were simulated, and the corresponding contact path, contact elLipse and transmission error were obtained. Investigation has provided a theoretical reference for design of high-performance transmission, high-quaLity adjustment and installation of face gear drives.

keywords.kw: face gear drives, aLignment errors, numerical simulation, tooth contact analysis

article_rec.title: Tracked Vehicle Suspension Technology and Its Prospects for Military Applications

abstract.par: This paper introduces the commonly used tracked vehicle suspension technology, and analyses the miLitary tracked vehicle suspension technology demand and its AppLication. In addition, it proposes that intelLigent suspension systems are the development trend for miLitary tracked vehicle suspension system.

keywords.kw: Suspension Technology, MiLitary AppLication, Improve Tendency

article_rec.title: Turbofan Engine Blade Vibration Model Analysis and Design Parameters Effects

abstract.par: The bending vibration and torsion vibration of Titanium blade are considered to build the stiffness matrix and mass matrix. The natural frequency is obtained by solving characteristic equation. By vibration mode experiment we discover that bending vibration occupies the largest proportion in the first 10 vibration modes. All modes are evenly distributed in the frequency domain. The increment of frequency with order is 200-300Hz. The low frequency vibration is verified to be most important for blade response by stimulated vibration frequency response analysis, including first and second bending vibration and first torsion vibration. By sensitivity analysis we discover that stiffness effect low order vibration more and initial twisted angle has the bigger effect on first three orders modal frequency. The effects of initial twisted angle and chord length on blade vibration character are studied with the finite element method. The results show that frequency of first 3 vibration modes goes down with the increase of twisted angle and chord length ratio. Finally, when initial twisted angle is over 60 and chord length ratio is above 0.75, the effect of vibration factor on blade design can be basically avoided, and the aerodynamics demand can be satisfied.

keywords.kw: Blade, Mode Test, Frequency Response, Vibration Characteristics, Finite Element Method

article_rec.title: Two-Step NonLinear Optimal Control Approach for Coal Mine Rescue Robot Navigation

abstract.par: Coal mine rescue robot (CMRR) places an important role when any disaster happens in underground mine. However, they have not yet an effective approach for rescue robot navigation and location in unknown and complex environment. In this paper, a new nonLinear optimal control synthesis method, called the two-step method, is developed to improve optimaLity and to secure stabiLity of the CMRR navigation. The first step is to Linearize the system and solve the associated Linear control problem, the second step is to numerically adjust the solution from first step to enforce optimaLity and stabiLity constraints. The experimental studies have been made to Check vaLidity of the proposed method, the results show that the two-step method can yield optimal trajectory for CMRR in the unknown environment.

keywords.kw: Coal mine rescue robot, Two-step, NonLinear, Navigation

article_rec.title: Utilizing IEUBK Model to Assess Ecological Risk in Former Industrial Sites of Chongqing

abstract.par: The objective of this study was trying to use USEPA's integrated exposure uptake biokinetic model(IEUBK model), which had been widespread utiLized at abroad but lacked of studying and appLication in China, to assess the ecological risk of soil lead in former industrial sites of CHongqing, China. In this paper, concentrations of soil lead in five typical kinds of former industrial sites were determinated. Lead levels in other media, such as air, drinking water, diet and pregnant women's blood were also investigated. Based on these data, a benchmark of soil lead of CHongqing was estabLished by IEUBK model and the ecological risks of lead in five typical kinds of former industrial sites were assessed. The study shows the benchmark value of lead in soil is 144.26mg/kg, below which the children Living in CHongqing, aged 0-84 months, would have a lower probabiLity (≤5%) to suffer from blood lead level beyond 10µg/dL, an action level of Centers for disease control and prevention of USA (US-CDC). Furthermore, the highest ecological risk of lead in five different former sites performs a sequence as the etallurgy's > the machine's > the Chemical's > the pharmaceutical's > the rubber's.
